original: de 'dis ni gang rnams sngon po'i sgra'i don gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de rnams ni de'i nang du 'du ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dis ni gang rnams sngon po'i sgra'i don gyi khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de rnams ni de'i nang du 'du ba ma yin te /
translated: This means that those things that are not included in the meaning of the word blue are not included in it.

original: dper na ba la ka la sogs pa rnams bzhin /üîΩsngon po'i autpala la @260a * //
analyzed: dper na ba la ka la sogs pa rnams bzhin / sngon po'i autpala la @260a * //
translated: For example, it is like the cow and so on.üîΩThe blue lotus and so on are the particulars of the universal substance blue.

original: sogs ba rdzas kyi spyi'i khyad par rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sogs ba rdzas kyi spyi'i khyad par rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa gsungs so //
translated: This is the statement of the nonexistence of the pervader.

original: 'o na yang zhes pa lta ba gzhan la ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'o na yang zhes pa lta ba gzhan la ma grub pa nyid du gsal bar byed do //
translated: ‚Äú However‚Äù clarifies that the opponent does not accept this.

original: sngon po'i sgras sngon po'i yon tan na ma de'i rigs brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po'i sgras sngon po'i yon tan na ma de'i rigs brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The word blue does not express the type of the quality blue.

original: 'o na ci zhe na sngon po'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i spyis rdzas yin zhing /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na sngon po'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i spyis rdzas yin zhing /
translated: What does it express? It expresses the substance that possesses the quality blue.

original: de'i khyad par yang autpala sngon po la sogs pa rnams kyang yin no zhes pas kha na ma tho ba med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i khyad par yang autpala sngon po la sogs pa rnams kyang yin no zhes pas kha na ma tho ba med do zhe na /
translated: Thus, there is no fault.üîΩBut it is not reasonable that it be so,

original: de ltar 'gyur bar ni mi rigs te zhes pa nye bar bkod pa 'di ni de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi lta ba yin la /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur bar ni mi rigs te zhes pa nye bar bkod pa 'di ni de dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi lta ba yin la /
translated: this is the position of the opponent, who has set forth the objection.

original: de yang sngar bkag zin pa kho na'o zhes byas nas so //üîΩsngar bkag zin pa de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang sngar bkag zin pa kho na'o zhes byas nas so // sngar bkag zin pa de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: And that has been refuted just previously.üîΩHaving said that, he teaches just that which has been refuted previously.

original: sngar bshad phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because it was explained previously, etc.

original: de mi rigs te zhes pa /
analyzed: de mi rigs te zhes pa /
translated: That is not reasonable,

original: brjod par bya ba nyid kyis na nang du 'dus par 'dod cing /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba nyid kyis na nang du 'dus par 'dod cing /
translated: because of being the object of expression, it is asserted to be included within.

original: khyad par rnams spyi'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid du srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par rnams spyi'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid du srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not possible that the particularities be the object of expression of the word generality,

original: 'di la gtan tshigs gsungs pa ;
analyzed: 'di la gtan tshigs gsungs pa ;
translated: the reason for that is stated.üîΩBecause of doubt, etc.

original: the tshom za phyir zhes pa'i the tshom ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyis 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom za phyir zhes pa'i the tshom ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyis 'grel pa'o //
translated: The doubt is stated by this very .

original: gang las the tshom za ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni rjes su 'gro ba nye bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: gang las the tshom za ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni rjes su 'gro ba nye bar ston pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúFrom which there is doubt‚Äù and so on shows the forward pervasion.

original: 'gyur du chug na yang don gyis zhes pa la sogs pas ldog pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur du chug na yang don gyis zhes pa la sogs pas ldog pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEven if it were so‚Äù and so on shows the reverse pervasion.

original: shing sha ba'i sgra'i don ni shing gi spyi la mi 'khrul lo zhes pas shing sha pa'i sgra las don gyis shing gi spyi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing sha ba'i sgra'i don ni shing gi spyi la mi 'khrul lo zhes pas shing sha pa'i sgra las don gyis shing gi spyi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meaning of the word ≈õim≈õapƒÅ is not mistaken with regard to the universal of tree, and therefore the universal of tree is understood by implication from the word ≈õim≈õapƒÅ.

original: don gyis zhes pa smas pa ni dngos su brjod par byed par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyis zhes pa smas pa ni dngos su brjod par byed par mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúby implication‚Äù is used because it is not asserted that it is directly expressed.

original: gang zhig gang la the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa de ni de la nges pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la the tshom gyi rgyu yin pa de ni de la nges pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: That which is the cause of doubt with regard to something is not the cause of ascertainment with regard to that,

original: dper na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag la gzhal bya nyid bzhin /
analyzed: dper na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dag la gzhal bya nyid bzhin /
translated: just like being an object of knowledge is with regard to permanence and impermanence.

original: spyi'i sgra yang khyad par rnams la the tshom gyi rgyu yin no zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: spyi'i sgra yang khyad par rnams la the tshom gyi rgyu yin no zhes pa rang bzhin 'gal ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù is the cause of doubt with regard to the particulars. This is the inherent contradiction.

original: 'di nyid kyi chos mi mthun ba nyid kyi sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi chos mi mthun ba nyid kyi sbyor ba ni /
translated: This is the application of the dissimilar quality.

original: gang zhig gang la nges pa'i rgyu yin pa de ni de la the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la nges pa'i rgyu yin pa de ni de la the tshom gyi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is the cause of ascertaining something is not the cause of doubt regarding that.

original: dper na khyad par gyi sgra'i don ni spyi la bzhin /
analyzed: dper na khyad par gyi sgra'i don ni spyi la bzhin /
translated: For example, the meaning of the word ‚Äúdistinction‚Äù is included in the universal.

original: spyi'i sgra ni khyad par rnams la nges pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhen the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i sgra ni khyad par rnams la nges pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhen the tshom gyi rgyu'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúuniversal‚Äù is not the cause of ascertaining distinctions, but rather it is the cause of doubt.

original: 'o na gang 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ni gal te khyad par spyi'i nang du 'dus pa ma yin na /
analyzed: 'o na gang 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ni gal te khyad par spyi'i nang du 'dus pa ma yin na /
translated: If distinctions are not included in universals,

original: de ci ltar lung 'di dang 'gal ba ma yin zhes pa bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de ci ltar lung 'di dang 'gal ba ma yin zhes pa bsams pa'o //
translated: how is this scripture not contradicted?

original: 'di zhes pa la sogs pas lung rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'di zhes pa la sogs pas lung rtogs par byed do //
translated: The scripture is understood through ‚Äúthis‚Äù and so on.

original: rnam @260b grangs la gcig las rtogs pa rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams la ni rnam grangs kyi sgra gcig kho na las brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam @260b grangs la gcig las rtogs pa rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams la ni rnam grangs kyi sgra gcig kho na las brjod par 'dod pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: In the case of synonyms, the meaning intended is understood from just one synonym.

original: de las kyang gnyis pa sbyor ba med pa kho na'o zhes pas ci ltar mthun pa nyid dam khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po yin zhes pa dgos pa'o ;
analyzed: de las kyang gnyis pa sbyor ba med pa kho na'o zhes pas ci ltar mthun pa nyid dam khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po yin zhes pa dgos pa'o ;
translated: What is the point of saying that the second is only without application? It is to show that it is the same as the other, or that it is the entity that is qualified and the qualifier.

original: /'o na rnam grangs kyi sgra du ma lhan cig sbyar bas kyang don gcig rtogs par bya ba bzhin pa mthong ste /
analyzed: /'o na rnam grangs kyi sgra du ma lhan cig sbyar bas kyang don gcig rtogs par bya ba bzhin pa mthong ste /
translated: Now, it is seen that even when many synonymous terms are used together, a single meaning is understood,üîΩas in the case of cuckoo and kokila.

original: dper na khu byug dang ko ki la bzhin no zhe na /üîΩgsungs pa / rnam grangs kyi sgras ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dper na khu byug dang ko ki la bzhin no zhe na / gsungs pa / rnam grangs kyi sgras ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said:üîΩThe meaning of a synonymous term is not understood, so another synonym is used.

original: de la don nges par ma shes pa la rnam grangs gzhan sbyor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la don nges par ma shes pa la rnam grangs gzhan sbyor bar 'gyur te /
translated: There, when the meaning is not ascertained, another synonym is used.

original: dper na 'ga' zhig khu byug gi sgra la don nges par ma shes pa la de'i don rtogs pa'i ched du ko ki la'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na 'ga' zhig khu byug gi sgra la don nges par ma shes pa la de'i don rtogs pa'i ched du ko ki la'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: For example, when someone does not ascertain the meaning of the word cuckoo, for the purpose of understanding its meaning, the word kokila is used.

original: don du ma can la yang don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i khyad par gyi don rtogs pa'i ched du ste /
analyzed: don du ma can la yang don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i khyad par gyi don rtogs pa'i ched du ste /
translated: Even when there are many meanings, for the purpose of understanding the meaning that distinguishes others,

original: dper na aa ksha'i sgra la ba ru ra'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na aa ksha'i sgra la ba ru ra'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the word ‚Äúvariegated‚Äù for the word ‚Äúak·π£a.‚Äù

original: 'dir ni rnam pa 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni rnam pa 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, this aspect does not exist.

original: de'i phyir gnyis pa sbyor ba mi rigs so zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis pa sbyor ba mi rigs so zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the second application is not reasonable. This is the intended meaning.

original: yang ci'i phyir rnam grangs gcig sbyor ba na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rnam grangs gcig sbyor ba na /
translated: Again, why, when applying one enumeration,

original: de la gnyis pa mi sbyor zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la gnyis pa mi sbyor zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: is the second not applied? It is said:

original: 'di nyid ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThis very‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'di ni don dang mthun pa'i ming ste /
analyzed: 'di ni don dang mthun pa'i ming ste /
translated: This is a name that accords with the meaning.

original: rnam grangs kyi don mngon par rjod par byed do zhes pa rnam grangs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi don mngon par rjod par byed do zhes pa rnam grangs pa'o //
translated: It expresses the meaning of the enumeration. This is the enumeration.

original: de cig car sbyor ba la med de rang gi rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de cig car sbyor ba la med de rang gi rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That does not exist in the simultaneous application, because it lacks its own reason.

original: 'gyur du zhes pa 'di las mtshungs par brjod pa kho na cig car sbyor ba dang 'brel lo zhes ston to zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur du zhes pa 'di las mtshungs par brjod pa kho na cig car sbyor ba dang 'brel lo zhes ston to zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlternately‚Äù indicates that the expression is exactly the same, connected with the simultaneous application.

original: rnam grangs pa nyid ces pa ni rnam grangs pa'i sgra'i brjod bar bya ba nyid ces pa'i don te ;
analyzed: rnam grangs pa nyid ces pa ni rnam grangs pa'i sgra'i brjod bar bya ba nyid ces pa'i don te ;
translated: ‚ÄúThe very enumeration‚Äù means the very expression of the word ‚Äúenumeration.‚Äù

original: de ltar na yang zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: de ltar na yang zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: Thus, ‚Äúand so forth‚Äù and so on.

original: gang gi phyir rnam grangs pa'i sgra ni gcig kho na brjod pa'i ched du nus pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam grangs pa'i sgra ni gcig kho na brjod pa'i ched du nus pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because the term ‚Äúalternative‚Äù is capable of expressing only one thing,

original: autpala'i sgra dang bcas pa'i gsal bar bya ba'i don ni sngon po'i sgra 'ba' zhig pa kho nas rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: autpala'i sgra dang bcas pa'i gsal bar bya ba'i don ni sngon po'i sgra 'ba' zhig pa kho nas rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: the object to be expressed along with the term ‚Äúlotus‚Äù is understood by the term ‚Äúblue‚Äù alone.

original: gcad par bya ba nyid med do zhes pas khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po med do //
analyzed: gcad par bya ba nyid med do zhes pas khyad par dang khyad par gyi gzhi'i dngos po med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no basis for the distinction and the distinguished.

original: gzhi mthun ba nyid ni gnyis pa sbyor ba med pa kho na'i phyir 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhi mthun ba nyid ni gnyis pa sbyor ba med pa kho na'i phyir 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The common locus is not the case, because there is no second application.

original: de bzhin du tha dad pa la yang zhes pa skyon zhes 'dug go //
analyzed: de bzhin du tha dad pa la yang zhes pa skyon zhes 'dug go //
translated: Similarly, there is the error in the case of difference.

original: yang ci ltar skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar skyon yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is there an error? He says:

original: tshogs pa gzhan nyid du bsgrub par bya na zhes pa 'grub ba ma yin no zhes pa'i @261a * //
analyzed: tshogs pa gzhan nyid du bsgrub par bya na zhes pa 'grub ba ma yin no zhes pa'i @261a * //
translated: If the collection is to be established as different, it is not established.

original: don to // ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /üîΩde zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: don to // ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na / de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: What is to be established? He says:

original: cha shas can de cha shas de rnams su'am /
analyzed: cha shas can de cha shas de rnams su'am /
translated: That part-possessor is in those parts.

original: cha shas de rnams tshogs pa der mtha' dag gis te bdag nyid thabs kyis sam phyogs gcig gis te cha shas 'jug ba srid pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: cha shas de rnams tshogs pa der mtha' dag gis te bdag nyid thabs kyis sam phyogs gcig gis te cha shas 'jug ba srid pa ma yin pas so //
translated: The whole does not enter into the parts by its totality, by a part, or by a plurality of parts.

original: gal te cha shas can cha shas rnams su phyogs gcig gis 'jug na cha shas thug pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te cha shas can cha shas rnams su phyogs gcig gis 'jug na cha shas thug pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: If the whole entered into the parts by a part, the parts would be without end.

original: de ltar ni cha shas gang rnams kyis cha shas can 'phrod pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu'i cha shas rnams la 'jug pa de rnams la yang cha shas kyi dbye ba de kho na sa 'jug par bya bas te /
analyzed: de ltar ni cha shas gang rnams kyis cha shas can 'phrod pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu'i cha shas rnams la 'jug pa de rnams la yang cha shas kyi dbye ba de kho na sa 'jug par bya bas te /
translated: In this way, the parts by which the whole enters into the parts that are the cause of the conjunction of the whole, those parts also have a division of parts that are to be entered into.

original: slar yang de rnams la yang de bzhin no zhes pas thug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang de rnams la yang de bzhin no zhes pas thug pa med pa'o //
translated: And again, those also have that, and so on, ad infinitum.

original: de 'jug pa na yang cha shas can 'jug pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'jug pa na yang cha shas can 'jug pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And when it enters, the whole does not enter into the parts.

original: de rnams la cha shas can med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams la cha shas can med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because those parts do not have a whole.

original: ci ste mtha' dag gis 'jug na de'i tshe yan lag can mang po nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste mtha' dag gis 'jug na de'i tshe yan lag can mang po nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: But if it enters by its totality, then the consequence is that there are many wholes.

original: cha shas rnams mang po nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: cha shas rnams mang po nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the parts are many.

original: de rnams su yang so sor bdag nyid thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩyul phyogs tha mi dad pa can nyid kyi phyir yang yan lag can gyis yan lag rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba'i yul phyogs kyis yul phyogs tha mi dad pa can rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams su yang so sor bdag nyid thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro // yul phyogs tha mi dad pa can nyid kyi phyir yang yan lag can gyis yan lag rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba'i yul phyogs kyis yul phyogs tha mi dad pa can rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: And in those parts, because of the completeness of the whole in each part.üîΩAnd because of the non-difference of the location, the whole and the parts would have the same location.

original: ci ste tha mi dad pa'i yul can du 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste tha mi dad pa'i yul can du 'dod na /
translated: But if you maintain that the whole and the parts have the same location,üîΩthen the whole would be a single substance.

original: de ltan 'o na cha shas can rdzas gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa mtha' dag gi 'jug pa'i skyon rnams ni de rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: de ltan 'o na cha shas can rdzas gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa mtha' dag gi 'jug pa'i skyon rnams ni de rnams la yang ngo //
translated: All of these faults would apply to the whole and the parts.

original: de la gal te bdag nyid thams cad la yan lag can khyab par byas nas 'jug na /
analyzed: de la gal te bdag nyid thams cad la yan lag can khyab par byas nas 'jug na /
translated: If the whole pervades the parts with its entire self,

original: de las de ni cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de las de ni cha shas med pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: then because it is partless,

original: thams cad kyi yul phyogs gcig nyid de /
analyzed: thams cad kyi yul phyogs gcig nyid de /
translated: the location of the whole would be the same as the location of the parts.

original: de las kyang gang du lag pa yin pa der rkang pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pas 'dres mthong bar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang gang du lag pa yin pa der rkang pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo zhes pas 'dres mthong bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, it would follow that a mixture would be seen, since wherever there is a hand, a foot, and so on would also be there.

original: rnam par phye bas 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par phye bas 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to apprehend a composite.

original: ci ste yul phyogs gcig la 'jug na de kho na cha shas thug pa med pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste yul phyogs gcig la 'jug na de kho na cha shas thug pa med pa ste /
translated: But if it engages one part of the object, then that part would be infinitely divisible.

original: phyogs gcig pa gang rnams su cha shas pa rnams 'jug pa de nyid kyis kyang gzhan rnams su 'jug par bya zhing de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no zhes pa thug pa med pa'o //üîΩgang sngon po yin pa de autpala ma yin par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: phyogs gcig pa gang rnams su cha shas pa rnams 'jug pa de nyid kyis kyang gzhan rnams su 'jug par bya zhing de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no zhes pa thug pa med pa'o // gang sngon po yin pa de autpala ma yin par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Since it engages in one part, it would also engage in others, and they would also do so, and so on, ad infinitum.üîΩThat which is blue would not be a lotus,

original: gang yang autpala yin na de sngon po ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang autpala yin na de sngon po ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: and that which is a lotus would not be blue, and so on.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar mtha' @261b dag nyid kyis sam phyogs gcig gis 'jug pa srid pa ma yin pa de'i phyir cha shas las tha dad pa'i tshogs pa 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar mtha' @261b dag nyid kyis sam phyogs gcig gis 'jug pa srid pa ma yin pa de'i phyir cha shas las tha dad pa'i tshogs pa 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not possible for it to engage in any way, either in its entirety or in part, therefore the collection that is different from the parts is not established.

original: de ni don dag gi 'gyur ba 'am zhes pa /
analyzed: de ni don dag gi 'gyur ba 'am zhes pa /
translated: ‚Äú That is, the change of the objects‚Äù

original: de zhes pa gnyis dang sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: de zhes pa gnyis dang sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: The two ‚Äúthat‚Äùs are to be connected.

original: gal te 'ang don gcig la 'jug nyid //
analyzed: gal te 'ang don gcig la 'jug nyid //
translated: ‚Äú If it engages in one object‚Äù

original: ces pa 'di gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: ces pa 'di gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
translated: This is explained by ‚ÄúIf it engages in one object, etc.‚Äù

original: rdzas gcig la gnyis ka yang 'phrod pa 'du pa'i phyir rigs dang yon tan dag gi gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thad na khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas gcig la gnyis ka yang 'phrod pa 'du pa'i phyir rigs dang yon tan dag gi gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thad na khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is tenable that the common locus of a class and a quality is one substance because both are in contact with one substance, then the relation of qualifier and qualified is not tenable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not the case that they are different.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni phan tshun 'brel pa med pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni phan tshun 'brel pa med pa gsungs so //
translated: This says that they are not mutually related.

original: 'di yang / spyi dang khyad par nyid ma yin zhes pa 'di'i 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang / spyi dang khyad par nyid ma yin zhes pa 'di'i 'brel pa'o //
translated: This also is connected to ‚ÄúThey are not the universal and the instance.‚Äù

original: gang rnams phan tshun 'brel pa med pa de rnams ni khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rnams phan tshun 'brel pa med pa de rnams ni khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ma yin te /
translated: Those that are not mutually related are not the entity that is the differentia and the differentium.

original: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa bzhin rigs dang yon tan dag kyang phan tshun 'brel pa med do//
analyzed: bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa bzhin rigs dang yon tan dag kyang phan tshun 'brel pa med do//
translated: Like a pot and a cloth, etc., a genus and qualities are not mutually related.

original: khyab par byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa med pa'o //
translated: There is no pervasion.

original: rdzas dag gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: rdzas dag gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i phyir zhes pa /
translated: Because substances do not engage in other.

original: gang gi phyir rigs dang yon tan dag gis khyad par du byas pa'i rdzas dag ni gang la de dag 'jug par 'gyur ba gzhan la rag las pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rigs dang yon tan dag gis khyad par du byas pa'i rdzas dag ni gang la de dag 'jug par 'gyur ba gzhan la rag las pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Because substances that are differentiated by a genus and qualities do not depend on another in which they would engage,

original: de'i phyir gcig la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir gcig la 'jug pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: therefore, because they do not engage in one,

original: phyogs dang nam mkha' dag bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid med do zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa nyid gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: phyogs dang nam mkha' dag bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid med do zhes pa khyab par byed pa med pa nyid gsal bar byed do //
translated: like direction and space, they do not have a common locus. This clarifies that there is no pervasion.

original: yang ci'i phyir de ldan dag gi zhes brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir de ldan dag gi zhes brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: Again, why is it said, ‚Äúof those that possess them‚Äù?

original: ci tsam gyis rdzas gcig yin pa de gnyi ga'i khyad par gyi khyad par du byas pa yin te /
analyzed: ci tsam gyis rdzas gcig yin pa de gnyi ga'i khyad par gyi khyad par du byas pa yin te /
translated: To the extent that they are the same substance, they are distinguished as the particulars of both.

original: gcig kyang yon tan tha dad pa la brten nas de skad bshad do zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: gcig kyang yon tan tha dad pa la brten nas de skad bshad do zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: But even though they are the same, they are explained in that way in dependence on different qualities.üîΩTherefore there is no fault.

original: gnyi ga'am gcig la ni spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: gnyi ga'am gcig la ni spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it is illogical that both or one are the universal and the particular.

original: sngon po'i rdzas bung ba la sogs pa la dang / autpala'i rdzas la spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid yod pa ma yin pas te /
analyzed: sngon po'i rdzas bung ba la sogs pa la dang / autpala'i rdzas la spyi dang khyad par dang ldan pa nyid yod pa ma yin pas te /
translated: The substance of blue, such as a bee, and the substance of an utpala flower do not have the universal and the particular because

original: de'i phyir 'di dag la khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag la khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba med do //
translated: therefore they do not have the relationship of particular and that which is particularized.

original: rigs gnyis bzhin no //
analyzed: rigs gnyis bzhin no //
translated: Like the two universals.

original: gcig la ni gang di rigs dang yon tan dag lhan cig 'jug pa de kho na de'i spyi'am khyad par du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas te /
analyzed: gcig la ni gang di rigs dang yon tan dag lhan cig 'jug pa de kho na de'i spyi'am khyad par du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas te /
translated: It is not that the universal or particular of a single thing is that which is the simultaneous engagement of the universal and quality.

original: de'i phyir 'di la yang khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po med de /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la yang khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po med de /
translated: Therefore this also does not have the relationship of particular and that which is particularized.

original: dper na bum pa gcig bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa gcig bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a single pot.

original: @262a * // shin tu tha dad pa dag ni zhes pa /
analyzed: @262a * // shin tu tha dad pa dag ni zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúVery different‚Äù means

original: spyi dang khyad par dag la tha dad pa yod pa nyid de /üîΩde dang ma yin pa'i yul nyid kyis te /
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par dag la tha dad pa yod pa nyid de / de dang ma yin pa'i yul nyid kyis te /
translated: that universals and particulars do exist as different.

original: shin tu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shin tu ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that they are not different at all.

original: des na da rnam par gcad pa'i ched du shin tu smos so //
analyzed: des na da rnam par gcad pa'i ched du shin tu smos so //
translated: Therefore, in order to distinguish them, ‚Äúvery‚Äù is stated.

original: de lta na yang ba lang dang rta'i sgra bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de lta na yang ba lang dang rta'i sgra bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid mi 'thad do //
translated: Even so, it is not tenable that they are a common locus, like the words ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúhorse.‚Äù

original: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po yang rigs dang yon tan rjod par byed pa'i sgra dag la 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po yang rigs dang yon tan rjod par byed pa'i sgra dag la 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, the state of being a particular and the state of being a universal are not tenable in terms of words that express a type and a quality.

original: de dag gi khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ni don gyi sgo can yin na /
analyzed: de dag gi khyad par dang khyad par du bya ba'i dngos po ni don gyi sgo can yin na /
translated: Because the state of being a particular and the state of being a universal are based on objects,

original: de dag gi don rigs dang yon tan dag la mngon par 'brel pa ci yang med pa'o//
analyzed: de dag gi don rigs dang yon tan dag la mngon par 'brel pa ci yang med pa'o//
translated: there is no connection at all between those words and the objects, the type and the quality.

original: de las kyang ba lang dang rta la sogs pa'i sgra'i dpes khyab par byed pa med par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de las kyang ba lang dang rta la sogs pa'i sgra'i dpes khyab par byed pa med par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the example of the words ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúhorse‚Äù should be applied to the absence of pervasion.

original: 'dra dang mi 'drar thal bar 'gyur //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: 'dra dang mi 'drar thal bar 'gyur // zhes pa la /
translated: It follows that there would be the absurd consequence of similarity and dissimilarity.

original: 'dra ba'i sgra ni 'dir gcig gi rnam grangs te gcig pa'am gcig ma yin pa can gyi gzhi can du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i sgra ni 'dir gcig gi rnam grangs te gcig pa'am gcig ma yin pa can gyi gzhi can du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Here the word ‚Äúsimilarity‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúone.‚Äù The meaning is that it follows that the basis would be one or not one.

original: de las kyang gzhi mthun pa nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: de las kyang gzhi mthun pa nyid med pa ste /
translated: Moreover, there is no common locus.

original: gzhi mthun pa kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa kho nar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes byas nas so //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the case that there is a common locus.

original: mi 'dra brjod 'dod min zhe na //
analyzed: mi 'dra brjod 'dod min zhe na //
translated: If you say that you do not wish to say that they are dissimilar,

original: zhes pa gzhi mthun zhing mi mthun pa srid na /
analyzed: zhes pa gzhi mthun zhing mi mthun pa srid na /
translated: if it is possible that there is a common locus and a noncommon locus,

original: gzhi mthun pa can la brten nas gzhi mthun par brjod par bya zhing /
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa can la brten nas gzhi mthun par brjod par bya zhing /
translated: then you should state that there is a common locus on the basis of a common locus.

original: bsgrub pas gzhi mthun pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir na gzhi tha dad pa dgag par mi byed kyi 'o na ci zhe na tha mi dad pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pas gzhi mthun pa nyid du brjod pa'i phyir na gzhi tha dad pa dgag par mi byed kyi 'o na ci zhe na tha mi dad pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Since you state that there is a common locus on the basis of a common locus, you do not refute that the basis is different. What do you do? You establish that the basis is not different.

original: des na de srid tsam brjod par 'dod pas 'dra ba nyid de /
analyzed: des na de srid tsam brjod par 'dod pas 'dra ba nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the mere possibility of that is what is intended.

original: de srid la brten nas gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de srid la brten nas gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: And on the basis of that possibility, there is a common locus.üîΩThe difference that is made related to the thing is not something that is not posited by the one who wishes to speak, and so it is not something to be imagined for the sake of nondifference of the basis.

original: gang dngos po las 'brel pa can du byas pa'i tha dad pa de ni brjod par 'dod pas nye bar ma bzhag pa nyid kyi phyir na gzhi tha mi dad pa nyid kyi ched du brtag par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa pha rol po'i bsam pa
analyzed: gang dngos po las 'brel pa can du byas pa'i tha dad pa de ni brjod par 'dod pas nye bar ma bzhag pa nyid kyi phyir na gzhi tha mi dad pa nyid kyi ched du brtag par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa pha rol po'i bsam pa
translated: This is the thought of the opponent,

original: 'di gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di gsal bar byed do //
translated: and it is made clear.

original: gang du yang zhes pa la sogs pas sel pa'i phyogs la yang rigs pa 'di la brten par bya'o zhes ston par byed de //üîΩblo rnam pa mtshungs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: gang du yang zhes pa la sogs pas sel pa'i phyogs la yang rigs pa 'di la brten par bya'o zhes ston par byed de // blo rnam pa mtshungs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: In the case of the negation, ‚Äúin no way,‚Äù this reasoning should be applied.üîΩ‚ÄúBecause of being the cause of a cognition with a similar aspect‚Äù means

original: gzhi 'dra bar snang ba'i blo'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gzhi 'dra bar snang ba'i blo'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: ‚Äúbecause of being the cause of a cognition that appears to be a similar basis.‚Äù

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: der yang me tog kha zum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams brjod bar 'dod na /
analyzed: der yang me tog kha zum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams brjod bar 'dod na /
translated: If the difference of the closed flower, etc., is what is intended to be expressed,üîΩthen the difference of the closed flower, etc.,

original: gang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo sgras nye bar skyed par ston cing /
analyzed: gang tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi blo sgras nye bar skyed par ston cing /
translated: The cognition that has the aspect of the non-different is produced by the word.

original: de tsam la brten nas khyod kyis kyang gzhi mthun pa @262b nyid rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de tsam la brten nas khyod kyis kyang gzhi mthun pa @262b nyid rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Based on just that, you should also posit a common locus.

original: gnyis ka rnam par bsal bas rjes su bzung na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka rnam par bsal bas rjes su bzung na zhes pa'o //
translated: If it is accepted that both are excluded,

original: gnyis ka rnams par bsal ba ni sngon po ma yin pa dang autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka rnams par bsal ba ni sngon po ma yin pa dang autpala ma yin pa las ldog pa'o //
translated: the exclusion of both is the opposite of not being blue and not being a lotus.

original: de yang ldog pa dang lnga pa la don dam par gzhan ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: de yang ldog pa dang lnga pa la don dam par gzhan ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: Moreover, in the fifth chapter it is said that ultimately it is not different.

original: de kho na sngon po ma yin pa dang autpala ma yin pa las log pa autpala sngon po zhes bya ba sngon po'i de nyid du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na sngon po ma yin pa dang autpala ma yin pa las log pa autpala sngon po zhes bya ba sngon po'i de nyid du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, that very thing, which is the opposite of not being blue and not being a lotus, should be called the blueness of the blue lotus.

original: des rjes su bzung zhing phan btags pa ni /
analyzed: des rjes su bzung zhing phan btags pa ni /
translated: Accepting and benefiting that,

original: yang blo la yod pa'i sgra'i don de'i nye bar skyed par byed pa kho na ste /
analyzed: yang blo la yod pa'i sgra'i don de'i nye bar skyed par byed pa kho na ste /
translated: the meaning of the word that exists in the cognition is just its producer.

original: de kho na la autpala sngon po'i sgra'i bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de kho na la autpala sngon po'i sgra'i bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The function of the word blue lotus is just in that.

original: me tog kha ma bye ba la sogs pa rnam par bsal bas rjes su gzung ba la ni ma yin no zhes pas de tsam kho na brjod par 'dod pa rigs kyi gzhan me tog kha ma bye ba la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: me tog kha ma bye ba la sogs pa rnam par bsal bas rjes su gzung ba la ni ma yin no zhes pas de tsam kho na brjod par 'dod pa rigs kyi gzhan me tog kha ma bye ba la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the unopened flower and so on are included by the exclusion of the opened flower and so on. Therefore, it is reasonable to assert that only that much is intended, not the unopened flower and so on.

original: 'brel pa can du byas pa dag ni zhes pa sngon po dang autpala'i sgra dag ni sngon po'i yon tan dang autpala'i rigs dag gis rnam par bcad pa kho na'i dngos po la de'i rgyu mtshan can dag 'jug go //
analyzed: 'brel pa can du byas pa dag ni zhes pa sngon po dang autpala'i sgra dag ni sngon po'i yon tan dang autpala'i rigs dag gis rnam par bcad pa kho na'i dngos po la de'i rgyu mtshan can dag 'jug go //
translated: The words ‚Äúblue‚Äù and ‚Äúlotus‚Äù are applied to a thing that is qualified only by the exclusion of the quality of blueness and the class lotus.

original: de la gal te khyad par du byed pas byas pa'i khyad par brjod par 'dod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te khyad par du byed pas byas pa'i khyad par brjod par 'dod pa ma yin na /
translated: If it is not the case that the difference created by the qualifier is intended to be expressed,

original: don med pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po de ci ltar brjod par bya ba yin /
analyzed: don med pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po de ci ltar brjod par bya ba yin /
translated: how can the thing that is the meaningless entity be expressed?

original: dngos por na rang nyid las sngon po dang / autpala la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas so zhes pas tha snyad du mi bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos por na rang nyid las sngon po dang / autpala la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas so zhes pas tha snyad du mi bya ba kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were an entity, it would not be the nature of blue, lotus, and so on, by itself. Therefore, it would be only a non-entity.

original: rta dang ba lang sogs mtshungs nyid //
analyzed: rta dang ba lang sogs mtshungs nyid //
translated: The horse and the cow, etc. are the same.

original: ces pas gal te sgra'i yul du byas pa'i yang khyad par brjod par mi 'dod na /
analyzed: ces pas gal te sgra'i yul du byas pa'i yang khyad par brjod par mi 'dod na /
translated: If one does not wish to express the difference of the object of the word,

original: ba lang ngo rta'i zhes pa 'dir yang mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba lang ngo rta'i zhes pa 'dir yang mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then here also the cow and the horse are the same.

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin nyid du zhes pa /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin nyid du zhes pa /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the verse means

original: gang de spyi dang khyad par dang bral ba'i dngos po tsam de sgra rnams kyi yul ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gang de spyi dang khyad par dang bral ba'i dngos po tsam de sgra rnams kyi yul ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: that a thing which is devoid of the universal and the particular is not the object of words,

original: 'dres pa'i tshig gi don gyis nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos po'i khyad par gyi yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i tshig gi don gyis nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dngos po'i khyad par gyi yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the object of words is a thing which is established by the word that signifies a collection.

original: de las kyang ba lang dang rta ni mtshungs pa nyid de khyad par med pa nyid du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de las kyang ba lang dang rta ni mtshungs pa nyid de khyad par med pa nyid du 'gyur zhing /
translated: And from that, the cow and the horse are the same, i.e., they are not different,

original: autpala sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: autpala sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: and the consequence is that they are a common locus, like the blue lotus, etc.

original: 'di ltar dgongs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar dgongs te /
translated: This is the idea.

original: autpala sngon po zhes pas 'dir yang brjod par bya ba gcig bu cung zad kyang med de /üîΩsngon po'i yon tan dang autpala'i rigs yang dag bar sbyar bas thob pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par las @263a * //
analyzed: autpala sngon po zhes pas 'dir yang brjod par bya ba gcig bu cung zad kyang med de / sngon po'i yon tan dang autpala'i rigs yang dag bar sbyar bas thob pa'i ngo bo'i khyad par las @263a * //
translated: The phrase blue lotus indicates that there is not even the slightest thing to be expressed here that is different from the essence of the combination of the quality of blueness and the lotus type.

original: tha dad par autpala sngon po'i ngo bo gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad par autpala sngon po'i ngo bo gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no other essence of a blue lotus that is different from the particular essence that is obtained from the correct combination of the quality of blueness and the lotus type.

original: de las der yang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyis dngos po mtshungs pa kho na gzhi mthun pa nyid kyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: de las der yang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyis dngos po mtshungs pa kho na gzhi mthun pa nyid kyi rgyu ste /
translated: In that case, the reason for the common locus is simply the similarity of the thing that is not to be expressed.

original: de ni ba lang dang rta la yang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid khyad par med pa'o zhes pas gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thob pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de ni ba lang dang rta la yang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid khyad par med pa'o zhes pas gzhi mthun pa nyid 'thob pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Since that is not different in the case of an ox and a horse, the common locus is obtained, is what is being said.

original: der rnam pa'i khyad par yin na zhes pa /
analyzed: der rnam pa'i khyad par yin na zhes pa /
translated: If it is a particular aspect there,

original: ba lang nyid dang rta nyid la sogs pa 'brel pa can tha dad pas byas pa'i khyad par med par yang /
analyzed: ba lang nyid dang rta nyid la sogs pa 'brel pa can tha dad pas byas pa'i khyad par med par yang /
translated: then even without a difference in the particular aspect that is made by the difference in the related, such as ox-ness and horse-ness,

original: rang kho na las gang mngon par bsal ba'i spyi ba lang nyid la sogs pa sgras nye bar len pa ba lang dang rta la khyad par yod do //
analyzed: rang kho na las gang mngon par bsal ba'i spyi ba lang nyid la sogs pa sgras nye bar len pa ba lang dang rta la khyad par yod do //
translated: The universal, such as cowness, which is manifested only in itself, is the object of the word, while the cow and the horse are different.

original: de'i phyir 'di mi rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mi rigs te /
translated: Therefore, this is not correct.

original: ba lang dang rta lab lang nyid dang rta nyid dag tu brjod par 'dod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sgras yul du byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ba lang dang rta lab lang nyid dang rta nyid dag tu brjod par 'dod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sgras yul du byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: That which is intended to be expressed as cowness and horseness in the cow and the horse is just the object of the word.

original: gzhan du na de rjod par byed pa kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de rjod par byed pa kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would not be expressed at all.

original: rang gi spyi mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu zhes pa 'dis de yod pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i rgyu smras so //
analyzed: rang gi spyi mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu zhes pa 'dis de yod pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i rgyu smras so //
translated: By this, ‚Äúthe cause of the manifestation of its own universal,‚Äù he states the cause of the understanding of its existence.

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par las dbyibs yan lag yang dag par bkod pa'i bdag nyid rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par las dbyibs yan lag yang dag par bkod pa'i bdag nyid rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The shape, which is the cause of the manifestation of the universal, should be inferred from the particular effect, which is the arrangement of the parts.

original: 'o na brten pa'i chos kyi tha dad kho na 'di ste /
analyzed: 'o na brten pa'i chos kyi tha dad kho na 'di ste /
translated: But the difference of the dependent property is just this.

original: ji ltar ba lang nyid dang rta nyid la sogs pa rnams ni spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po ma yin pa gcod pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa'i dngos po rnams yin pa de bzhin du dbyibs kyang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar ba lang nyid dang rta nyid la sogs pa rnams ni spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos po ma yin pa gcod pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid du gyur pa ma yin pa'i dngos po rnams yin pa de bzhin du dbyibs kyang ngo //
translated: Just as the universal of cow and the universal of horse, etc. are not the substance of universals and particulars, because they are the cause of the exclusion of non-cow, etc., so also is shape.

original: de ltar na yang de nye bar bcom pa na dngos po'i bdag nyid kho na lus pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na yang de nye bar bcom pa na dngos po'i bdag nyid kho na lus pa'o zhe na /
translated: But even so, when it is destroyed, only the substance of the thing remains.

original: 'di bden te /
analyzed: 'di bden te /
translated: This is true.

original: skyon gzhan brjod par 'dod pas 'di la ltos par byas pa'o //
analyzed: skyon gzhan brjod par 'dod pas 'di la ltos par byas pa'o //
translated: But I have stated this in order to point out another fault.

original: de byas na de dag de ltar brjod pa na ci ltar brjod par 'dod pa ma yin zhes pa dbyibs kyi khyad par byas pa na ba lang ngo rta'o zhes pa 'di ltar brjod par gyur ba na ci ltar tha dad pa brjod par 'dod pa ma yin
analyzed: de byas na de dag de ltar brjod pa na ci ltar brjod par 'dod pa ma yin zhes pa dbyibs kyi khyad par byas pa na ba lang ngo rta'o zhes pa 'di ltar brjod par gyur ba na ci ltar tha dad pa brjod par 'dod pa ma yin
translated: If that is so, then when they are described in that way, how is it that they are not described as desired? When the particular shape is described as ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúhorse,‚Äù how is it that the difference is not described as desired?

original: / yang na der byas na ni de dag de ltar brjod pa dag ces pa /
analyzed: / yang na der byas na ni de dag de ltar brjod pa dag ces pa /
translated: Or, if that is done, then the description of them in that way is

original: 'di ni gnyis kyi tshig kho na'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gnyis kyi tshig kho na'o //
translated: this is only the statement of two.

original: brjod pa ni sgra ste 'dis brjod par bya ba'o zhes byas nas so ;
analyzed: brjod pa ni sgra ste 'dis brjod par bya ba'o zhes byas nas so ;
translated: ‚ÄúExpression‚Äù is sound. Having made this,

original: / autpala sngon po nyid dang ldan pa'i don gyi ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: / autpala sngon po nyid dang ldan pa'i don gyi ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: it is not the case that the meaning of ‚Äúpossessing blue lotusness‚Äù is the meaning of ‚Äúpossessing the quality of blueness and the type of lotus.‚Äù

original: yon tan sngon po dang rigs autpala dang ldan pa'i don gyi ni ba lang dang rta bzhin du dbyibs tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yon tan sngon po dang rigs autpala dang ldan pa'i don gyi ni ba lang dang rta bzhin du dbyibs tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúpossessing the quality of blueness and the type of lotus‚Äù is not a shape that is different from a cow and a horse.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin du ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin du ste /
translated: Therefore, just like the word ‚Äúblue lotus,‚ÄùüîΩthe words ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúhorse‚Äù are not synonyms.

original: autpala sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin du ba lang dang rta la sogs pa'i sgra @263b rnams gzhi mthun pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: autpala sngon po la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin du ba lang dang rta la sogs pa'i sgra @263b rnams gzhi mthun pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: If a universal were to manifest as different from different shapes,üîΩmany aspects would be mixed.

original: rnam pa du ma 'dres par 'gyur zhes pa gal te dbyibs tha dad pa las spyi tha dad pa mngon par gsal ba yin na /
analyzed: rnam pa du ma 'dres par 'gyur zhes pa gal te dbyibs tha dad pa las spyi tha dad pa mngon par gsal ba yin na /
translated: If a universal were to manifest as different from different shapes,

original: dngos po gcig la bum pa nyid dang yod pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pa mngon bar gsal ba'i phyir dbyibs du ma 'jug par thal bar 'gyur na ;
analyzed: dngos po gcig la bum pa nyid dang yod pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pa mngon bar gsal ba'i phyir dbyibs du ma 'jug par thal bar 'gyur na ;
translated: then it follows that many shapes would be engaged in a single thing because of the manifestation of potness, existence, substantiality, and so on.

original: mthong ba yang ma yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: mthong ba yang ma yin no zhes pa /
translated: But that is not seen.

original: ring po dang yongs su zlum po la sogs pa rnams gcig la 'jug pa ni mthong ba ma yin pas te /
analyzed: ring po dang yongs su zlum po la sogs pa rnams gcig la 'jug pa ni mthong ba ma yin pas te /
translated: It is not seen that long, round, and so on, are applied to one thing.

original: 'dis ni de med pa'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i ched du rang bzhin ma dmigs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni de med pa'i tha snyad 'grub pa'i ched du rang bzhin ma dmigs pa gsungs so //
translated: This shows that the non-observation of essence is stated for the purpose of establishing the convention of non-existence.

original: yang gi sgra ni khyod 'dod pa yang ma yin no zhes pa'i don gsal ba'i ched du'o ;
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni khyod 'dod pa yang ma yin no zhes pa'i don gsal ba'i ched du'o ;
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is for the purpose of clarifying that it is not what you assert.

original: / bum pa la sogs pa la rnam pa gcig pa'i brjod pa dang rtogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: / bum pa la sogs pa la rnam pa gcig pa'i brjod pa dang rtogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: It follows that there would be no expression or understanding of a single aspect in a pot and so on,

original: dbyibs du ma can gyi dngos po la de'i dbang du gyur pa'i sgra dang blo dag rnam pa gcig pa nyid ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dbyibs du ma can gyi dngos po la de'i dbang du gyur pa'i sgra dang blo dag rnam pa gcig pa nyid ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: because it is not tenable that with respect to a thing that has many shapes, the words and thoughts that are governed by it have a single aspect,

original: de'i dbang gis dngos po'i de'i ngo bo nges pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang gis dngos po'i de'i ngo bo nges pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the nature of that thing would not be ascertained by that.

original: de'i phyir dbyibs tha dad las spyi tha dad pa mngon par gsal ba ni khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no //üîΩgzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyibs tha dad las spyi tha dad pa mngon par gsal ba ni khas blang bar bya ba ma yin no //üîΩgzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is not to be accepted that a different universal is manifested from different shapes.üîΩMoreover, if the universal is different from the shape, then it is not tenable that it is the cause of the cognition of the shape.

original: snga ma ni ba lang nyid dang rta nyid dag gi khyad par brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang khyad par med pa'o zhes pas gzhi mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs par brjod do //
analyzed: snga ma ni ba lang nyid dang rta nyid dag gi khyad par brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang khyad par med pa'o zhes pas gzhi mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs par brjod do //
translated: The former is similar and dissimilar in that it is said that the difference between cowness and horseness is not to be expressed, and so they are similar in being not to be expressed, and they are dissimilar in that cowness and horseness are the clarifiers of existence and substance, etc.

original: da ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang yod pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mtshungs shing /
analyzed: da ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir dang yod pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mtshungs shing /
translated: Now, they are similar in that they are not to be expressed and in that they are the clarifiers of existence and substance, etc.

original: ba lang nyid dang rta nyid gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mi mtshungs pa yang ngo zhes pas gzhi mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: ba lang nyid dang rta nyid gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir mi mtshungs pa yang ngo zhes pas gzhi mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa'o //
translated: But they are dissimilar in that cowness and horseness are the clarifiers.

original: des na de la yang mi mtshungs pa nyid brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa la autpala sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: des na de la yang mi mtshungs pa nyid brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa la autpala sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du gzhi mthun pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, in that case, it is not asserted that they are dissimilar, and so there would be the fault of their being similar, like a blue lotus, etc.üîΩHe also states another fault:

original: 'dod pa la yang med ces skyon gzhan gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dod pa la yang med ces skyon gzhan gsungs so //
translated: Even if it is asserted, it does not exist.

original: gang la yang zhes pa la sogs pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: gang la yang zhes pa la sogs pa tshad ma'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn any case‚Äù and so on are the result of the valid cognition.

original: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa dpe'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa dpe'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIf‚Äù and so on is the example.

original: de bzhin du ni zhes pa la sogs pa phyogs chos so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni zhes pa la sogs pa phyogs chos so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the same way‚Äù and so on is the property of the position.

original: gang rnams spyi tha dad pa mngon bar byed pa de'i sgra rnams ni gzhi mthun pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rnams spyi tha dad pa mngon bar byed pa de'i sgra rnams ni gzhi mthun pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: The words that manifest a difference in the universal do not have a common locus,

original: ba lang dang rta bzhin du autpala yang de lta bu'o zhes pa 'gal bas khyab pa'i @264a * //
analyzed: ba lang dang rta bzhin du autpala yang de lta bu'o zhes pa 'gal bas khyab pa'i @264a * //
translated: because it is contradictory to say that a lotus is like that, like a cow and a horse.

original: thal 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thal 'gyur ro //
translated: This is a consequence that exposes a contradiction.

original: yon tan las dag gsal ba yin //
analyzed: yon tan las dag gsal ba yin //
translated: The qualities and actions are the manifestations.

original: gal te dbyibs kho na spyi'i gsal bar byed pa khas len na /
analyzed: gal te dbyibs kho na spyi'i gsal bar byed pa khas len na /
translated: If you accept that only shape manifests the universal,

original: yon tan nyid dang las nyid la sogs pa rnams mi gsal bar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yon tan nyid dang las nyid la sogs pa rnams mi gsal bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that the qualities, actions, and so on would not be manifested,

original: de rnams dbyibs dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams dbyibs dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they do not have shape.

original: gang la gsal bar byed pa med pa de gsal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang la gsal bar byed pa med pa de gsal ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is not manifested is not manifested,üîΩbecause it is not manifested.

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang gsal bar byed pa med do zhes pa rgyu med pa thal par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin yon tan nyid la sogs pa rnams la yang gsal bar byed pa med do zhes pa rgyu med pa thal par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Like a sky-flower, the qualities themselves and so on are not illuminated.

original: nus pa'i khyad par gyis zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par gyis zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: The assertion that the cause is a particular potency is stated as follows:

original: dbyibs kyi phyogs ngan pa'i phyir de dor nas phyogs gzhan 'god par byed do //
analyzed: dbyibs kyi phyogs ngan pa'i phyir de dor nas phyogs gzhan 'god par byed do //
translated: Since the shape is defective, one should discard it and posit another.

original: rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams la rdzas nyid la sogs pa gsal ba'i rgyu nus pa'i khyad par yod de /
analyzed: rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams la rdzas nyid la sogs pa gsal ba'i rgyu nus pa'i khyad par yod de /
translated: In the case of substance, quality, and action, there is a particular potency that is the cause of the manifestation of substance and so on.

original: de'i phyir yon tan dang las la son pa'i spyi mngon bar mi gsal ba'i skyon med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yon tan dang las la son pa'i spyi mngon bar mi gsal ba'i skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of the nonmanifestation of the universal that inheres in quality and action.

original: dngos po tha dad pa med kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa med kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The assertion that the cause is a particular potency is stated as follows:

original: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di 'di ltar ma yin te ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not so, because it is not ascertained.

original: de ltar ni bum pa la spyi du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir de gsal ba na nus pa'i khyad par khas blang bar bya zhing /
analyzed: de ltar ni bum pa la spyi du ma dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir de gsal ba na nus pa'i khyad par khas blang bar bya zhing /
translated: In this way, since a pot is endowed with many universals, when it is manifested, one should accept a particular potency.

original: de las kyang gcig la yang nus pa tha dad pa mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de las kyang gcig la yang nus pa tha dad pa mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because a different potentiality is seen in one,

original: tha dad pa bsgrub par bya ba'i ched du nus pa tha dad pa ni nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa bsgrub par bya ba'i ched du nus pa tha dad pa ni nus pa ma yin no //
translated: a different potentiality is not a potentiality for the sake of establishing a difference.

original: khyad par ci zhig byas pa yin //
analyzed: khyad par ci zhig byas pa yin //
translated: What difference is made?

original: zhes pa khyad par tha dad pa ni khyad par du bya ba tha dad pa bsgrub pa'i ched du nus pa'o zhes pas /
analyzed: zhes pa khyad par tha dad pa ni khyad par du bya ba tha dad pa bsgrub pa'i ched du nus pa'o zhes pas /
translated: A different potentiality is a potentiality for the sake of establishing a different thing to be distinguished.

original: de dag gi tha dad pa kho na rjes su sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag gi tha dad pa kho na rjes su sbyor bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, they are only different.

original: de rnams ni 'dod dga' ba'i sgra rnams la zhes pa rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis 'jug pa rnams ni 'dod dga' ba'i sgra rnams te ;
analyzed: de rnams ni 'dod dga' ba'i sgra rnams la zhes pa rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi rgyu mtshan gyis 'jug pa rnams ni 'dod dga' ba'i sgra rnams te ;
translated: They are called ‚Äúarbitrary sounds‚Äù because they engage by the mere reason of their own nature.

original: dita tha'i sgra la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: dita tha'i sgra la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: They are sounds such as dittha.

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyang ba lang nyid la sogs pa rnams la phyi rol gyi 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir 'dod dga' ba'i sgra rnams so //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyang ba lang nyid la sogs pa rnams la phyi rol gyi 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan med pa'i phyir 'dod dga' ba'i sgra rnams so //
translated: Sounds such as ‚Äúcow‚Äù are also arbitrary sounds because there is no external reason for engagement in cowness and so on.

original: de rnams kyi brjod par bya ba nyid kho na de rnams kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi brjod par bya ba nyid kho na de rnams kyi khyad par ro //
translated: The very fact that they are the referents of those words is their difference.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa 'dod dga' ba'i sgra'i yul rnams ni ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid kho nas dngos po gzhan las khyad par du bya ba'o zhes sgra las byung ba rnams sems par byed do //
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa 'dod dga' ba'i sgra'i yul rnams ni ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid kho nas dngos po gzhan las khyad par du bya ba'o zhes sgra las byung ba rnams sems par byed do //
translated: Those who believe that the words cow and so on are the referents of the words cow and so on think that the words cow and so on are distinguished from other things by the fact that they are the referents of the words cow and so on.

original: 'o na dita tha la sogs pa rnams la rang las kyang khyad par yod de /
analyzed: 'o na dita tha la sogs pa rnams la rang las kyang khyad par yod de /
translated: But then the words Dittha and so on would be distinguished from themselves,

original: sgra tsam gyis byas pa'i khyad par @264b yin na ni ming ma byas pa dang de'i nyin par skyes pa dag la khyad par 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra tsam gyis byas pa'i khyad par @264b yin na ni ming ma byas pa dang de'i nyin par skyes pa dag la khyad par 'thad pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: because if the difference were made by the words alone, then it would not be tenable that the words Dittha and so on would be distinguished from the words Dittha and so on that were not uttered and from those that arose on that day.

original: skyon 'di med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di med de /
translated: This error does not exist.

original: sgra'i bya ba la tha dad pa 'di bsam par bya'i /
analyzed: sgra'i bya ba la tha dad pa 'di bsam par bya'i /
translated: This difference should be considered in terms of the function of the words,

original: ma mthong ba la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in terms of what is not seen.

original: sgra'i bya ba la dita tha la sogs pa la khyad par gzhan yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i bya ba la dita tha la sogs pa la khyad par gzhan yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And the words Dittha and so on do not have another difference in terms of the function of the words.

original: brjod tha dad pas tha dad ces//
analyzed: brjod tha dad pas tha dad ces//
translated: They are different because of the difference in the words.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'dir sgra kho na'i tha dad pa ste don gyis ni ma yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'dir sgra kho na'i tha dad pa ste don gyis ni ma yin no zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: Here, the difference is only verbal, not in fact.

original: khyad par byas pa med pa'i dngos po la mngon bar rjod par byed pa'i sgras tha mi dad pa nye bar btags pa'i phyir /üîΩde las kyang khyad par du byas pa'i spyi mngon bar gsal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ba lang la sogs pa rnams khyad par du byas pa'o zhes pa brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par byas pa med pa'i dngos po la mngon bar rjod par byed pa'i sgras tha mi dad pa nye bar btags pa'i phyir / de las kyang khyad par du byas pa'i spyi mngon bar gsal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ba lang la sogs pa rnams khyad par du byas pa'o zhes pa brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Because the words that express things without distinctions make distinctions,üîΩand because they are the cause of the manifestation of the universal that is distinguished, it is said that cows and so on are distinguished.

original: spyi rnams kho na khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: spyi rnams kho na khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // ma yin te /
translated: But this is not to be said, because universals themselves are without distinctions.

original: de nyid brtag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: de nyid brtag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: No, because that itself is to be investigated.

original: de nyid de rjod byed kyis byas pa'i khyad par ni nag pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ba lang nyid la sogs pa rnams la bzhin du brtag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid de rjod byed kyis byas pa'i khyad par ni nag pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ba lang nyid la sogs pa rnams la bzhin du brtag par bya ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: That itself is to be investigated by the expression that makes the distinction, just as with cows and so on, because blackness and so on are also to be investigated.

original: ci nag pa dang byams pa dag la rang nyid las tha dad pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci nag pa dang byams pa dag la rang nyid las tha dad pa yin nam /
translated: Is it that the black and the friendly are different from themselves?

original: 'on te rjod byed tha dad pa las yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te rjod byed tha dad pa las yin zhes pa'o //
translated: Or is it that they are different due to the difference of the expressions?

original: 'o na de kho na las de tha dad pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na de kho na las de tha dad pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Well, then, it should be inferred that they are different from that very thing itself.üîΩIt is said:

original: gcig kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gcig kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Even one, etc.

original: rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams kyis ma nges pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa rtogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams kyis ma nges pa'i phyir de las tha dad pa rtogs par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Since the words of enumeration are not definite, it is not the case that difference from that is to be understood.

original: de la don bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa'i zhes pa sgra las te /
analyzed: de la don bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa'i zhes pa sgra las te /
translated: There, it is from the word, as it is in meaning, that the analysis is.

original: ba lang gi sgra dang rta'i sgra dag la khyad par ci zhig byas zhes brjod pa na rang gi spyi mngon bar gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi khyad par ro zhes gdon mi za bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra dang rta'i sgra dag la khyad par ci zhig byas zhes brjod pa na rang gi spyi mngon bar gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi khyad par ro zhes gdon mi za bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: When it is said, ‚ÄúWhat is the difference between the word cow and the word horse?‚Äù then one must certainly say that the difference is that they make their own universals manifest.

original: de ltar ni ba lang gi sgra ni ba lang gi sgra nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa po dang rta'i sgra ni rta'i sgra nyid kyi'o zhes pa de ltar gal te spyi tha dad pa mngon bar gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ba lang la sogs pa'i
analyzed: de ltar ni ba lang gi sgra ni ba lang gi sgra nyid kyis gsal bar byed pa po dang rta'i sgra ni rta'i sgra nyid kyi'o zhes pa de ltar gal te spyi tha dad pa mngon bar gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ba lang la sogs pa'i
translated: Thus, the word cow is the manifestor of the word cow itself, and the word horse is the manifestor of the word horse itself.

original: sgra tha dad par 'dod na /
analyzed: sgra tha dad par 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that the words cow and so on are different because they manifest different universals,

original: rang nyid las tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang nyid las tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that they are not different from themselves.

original: de ltar ni spyi'i khyad par ba lang gi sgra nyid la sogs pa dang lhan cig tha mi dad par btags pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar ni spyi'i khyad par ba lang gi sgra nyid la sogs pa dang lhan cig tha mi dad par btags pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, the word cow and so on, which are the particularities of the universal, are not different from the word cow and so on because they are imputed to be not different from them.

original: nye bar btags pa las tha mi dad pa ste /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa las tha mi dad pa ste /
translated: They are not different from the imputations,

original: dngos po pa ni ma yin no //üîΩba lang gi sgra gcig pu yang sgra nyid dang ba lang gi sgra nyid dang yon tan nyid la sogs pa @265a * //
analyzed: dngos po pa ni ma yin no // ba lang gi sgra gcig pu yang sgra nyid dang ba lang gi sgra nyid dang yon tan nyid la sogs pa @265a * //
translated: but they are not things.

original: rnams kyi gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnams kyi gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, it follows that the single word cow is multiple because it is the manifestor of sound itself, the word cow itself, the quality of the word cow, and so on.

original: ci ste khyad par rjod byed kyis byas pa yin na de mi rigs te /
analyzed: ci ste khyad par rjod byed kyis byas pa yin na de mi rigs te /
translated: But if it is the expression of the distinction that is made, that is not correct.üîΩBecause even a single thing is the object of expression of many synonyms.

original: gcig kyang rnam grangs du ma'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes don la bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa 'di'o //
analyzed: gcig kyang rnam grangs du ma'i sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes don la bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa 'di'o //
translated: This is the analysis of the meaning.

original: yang na de la don bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa zhes pa sgra'i spyi la ste /
analyzed: yang na de la don bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa zhes pa sgra'i spyi la ste /
translated: Or, in that case, the analysis of the meaning is in regard to the general term.

original: 'di'i khyad par ci zhig byas zhes snga ma bzhin du rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i khyad par ci zhig byas zhes snga ma bzhin du rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
translated: What is the distinction that is made in this case? It should be analyzed as before.

original: de ni rjod par byed pa ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum gyi yul te /
analyzed: de ni rjod par byed pa ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum gyi yul te /
translated: That is not the expression, etc. The object of direct perception is the intrinsic identity.

original: de yang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And that is not shared.

original: don dang lhan cig sngon mthong ba ma yin zhing /
analyzed: don dang lhan cig sngon mthong ba ma yin zhing /
translated: It is not seen together with the object.

original: sngar 'brel ba ma bzung ba la rjod par byed pa nyid yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar 'brel ba ma bzung ba la rjod par byed pa nyid yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that there is expression in the apprehension of a prior connection.

original: shing rta la sogs pas rab tu sbyar ba yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: shing rta la sogs pas rab tu sbyar ba yang zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
translated: The application of the chariot, etc.

original: don gang kho na mchog gis rab tu spyar ba'i sgras smras pa de kho na mchog ma yin pas spyar bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: don gang kho na mchog gis rab tu spyar ba'i sgras smras pa de kho na mchog ma yin pas spyar bas kyang ngo //
translated: The meaning that is expressed by the word that is used by the best is also understood from the word that is used by the not-so-best.

original: gal te yang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pas sgra rnams dbye bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pas sgra rnams dbye bar bya ba yin na /
translated: If the words are distinguished by the difference of their own characteristics,

original: don de dang de'i rjod par byed par 'gyur zhing de las kyang go ni la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis don de kho na mi rtogs par 'gyur na rtogs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don de dang de'i rjod par byed par 'gyur zhing de las kyang go ni la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis don de kho na mi rtogs par 'gyur na rtogs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: then the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù would not express that very same meaning that the word ‚Äúgo‚Äù expresses, and yet it does express that meaning.

original: de'i phyir khyad par rjod par byed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par rjod par byed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, the words do not express a particular,

original: mtshungs pa kho na rjod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: mtshungs pa kho na rjod par byed pa ste /
translated: but rather a universal.

original: de ltar na mchog ma yin pas spyor ba'i sgra las kyang don de kho na rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na mchog ma yin pas spyor ba'i sgra las kyang don de kho na rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the meaning is understood from the word that is used by the not-so-best,

original: spyi tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is not different.

original: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: spyi bo dang rgyab dang lto ba zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa /
analyzed: spyi bo dang rgyab dang lto ba zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa /
translated: In the case of words such as ‚Äúhead,‚Äù ‚Äúback,‚Äù and ‚Äúbelly,‚Äù

original: mgo bo zhes pa'i shes pa dang / ji srid du lag pa zhes pa'i shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yan lag gi dbyibs kyi khyad par rnams las zhes pa'i don to //üîΩde ltar ni gang gi tshe mgo bo nyid rang gi rten gyi dbyibs kyis gsal ba de'i tshe de las mgo bo zhes pa'i shes par 'gyur ro //üîΩgsal byed gsal ba las tha dad //üîΩces pa la sogs pa gsal byed rdzas kyis byas pa'i gsal ba ni /
analyzed: mgo bo zhes pa'i shes pa dang / ji srid du lag pa zhes pa'i shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yan lag gi dbyibs kyi khyad par rnams las zhes pa'i don to // de ltar ni gang gi tshe mgo bo nyid rang gi rten gyi dbyibs kyis gsal ba de'i tshe de las mgo bo zhes pa'i shes par 'gyur ro // gsal byed gsal ba las tha dad // ces pa la sogs pa gsal byed rdzas kyis byas pa'i gsal ba ni /
translated: The cognition called ‚Äúhead‚Äù up to the cognition called ‚Äúhand‚Äù is the particular shape of the parts.üîΩIn this way, when the head itself is manifested by the shape of its own support, then from that there is the cognition called ‚Äúhead.‚ÄùüîΩThe manifestation is different from the manifest.üîΩThe manifestation produced by the substance of the manifestor, etc.üîΩ

original: rang gi spyi'i ngo bo gsal bar byed pa'o //üîΩde las tha dad pa la spyi 'dod na /üîΩphan tshun brten par bshad pa 'thob ste /üîΩgang yang rung ba'ang ma rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩde las kyang phan tshun tha dad pa bsgrub pa'i ched du nus pa ma @265b yin no //
analyzed: rang gi spyi'i ngo bo gsal bar byed pa'o //üîΩde las tha dad pa la spyi 'dod na /üîΩphan tshun brten par bshad pa 'thob ste /üîΩgang yang rung ba'ang ma rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩde las kyang phan tshun tha dad pa bsgrub pa'i ched du nus pa ma @265b yin no //
