original: ba lang la sogs pa med pa las yod pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs par bya bar mi rigs so zhes pa 'di tsam gyis 'di nye bar bkod pa'o //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa med pa las yod pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs par bya bar mi rigs so zhes pa 'di tsam gyis 'di nye bar bkod pa'o //
translated: This much is the statement: ‚ÄúIt is not reasonable to understand the existence of a cow, etc. from the non-existence of a cow, etc.‚Äù

original: don gzhan las 'di gzhan sel ba rjes su 'gro ba dang rnam par ldan par brjod pa'i de ma thag tu rnam par 'jig pa nyid du brjod de /
analyzed: don gzhan las 'di gzhan sel ba rjes su 'gro ba dang rnam par ldan par brjod pa'i de ma thag tu rnam par 'jig pa nyid du brjod de /
translated: Immediately after the statement that this is associated with the exclusion of other, he says that it is destroyed.

original: de med pa'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes pa ngag gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de med pa'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes pa ngag gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder of the sentence is: ‚ÄúIt makes clear the non-existence of that.‚Äù

original: gang 'di khyod kyis gsal ba'i rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo 'grub pa'i don du brjod pa de ni med par 'grub pa yang gsal bar byed de /üîΩci'i phyir na gsal ba 'di ni med pa yang dag par rjes su 'gro ba las med pa rjes su ldan pa can te /
analyzed: gang 'di khyod kyis gsal ba'i rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo 'grub pa'i don du brjod pa de ni med par 'grub pa yang gsal bar byed de / ci'i phyir na gsal ba 'di ni med pa yang dag par rjes su 'gro ba las med pa rjes su ldan pa can te /
translated: What you have stated to establish the existence of a single class of manifestation and the principal is established as non-existence.

original: sa la sogs pa rnams dang ba lang la sogs pa rnams phan tshun gyi bdag nyid rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa rnams dang ba lang la sogs pa rnams phan tshun gyi bdag nyid rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Why is that? Because this manifestation is not associated with non-existence, but with the non-existence of the mutual natures of earth, etc. and cow, etc.

original: gang zhig gang dang ldan pa de'i 'di rnam par 'gyur ba ste ;
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang ldan pa de'i 'di rnam par 'gyur ba ste ;
translated: That which is endowed with what is its transformation.

original: dper na zho 'o ma dang ldan pa ni 'o ma'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na zho 'o ma dang ldan pa ni 'o ma'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin pa bzhin /
translated: For example, curd, which is endowed with milk, is the transformation of milk.

original: gsal ba 'di yang med pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba 'di yang med pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: This manifestation is also endowed with nonexistence.

original: de'i phyir gsal pa 'di ni med pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsal pa 'di ni med pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this manifestation is the transformation of nonexistence.

original: zho 'o ma dang ldan pa zhes pa ni grangs can gyi lugs kyi dbang du byas nas brjod pa'o //
analyzed: zho 'o ma dang ldan pa zhes pa ni grangs can gyi lugs kyi dbang du byas nas brjod pa'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúcurd, which is endowed with milk‚Äù is stated from the perspective of the SƒÅ·πÉkhya system.

original: gang zhig gang dang ldan pa de ni de'i rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang ldan pa de ni de'i rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: That which is endowed with what is its transformation.

original: dper na zho 'o ma'i bzhin gsal ba 'di yang med pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dper na zho 'o ma'i bzhin gsal ba 'di yang med pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: For example, curd is of milk. This manifestation is also endowed with nonexistence.

original: pha rol bo'i 'dod pas rang bzhin no //
analyzed: pha rol bo'i 'dod pas rang bzhin no //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs assertion is the nature.

original: 'dir yang med pa'i rnam 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dis med pa sngon ma can nyid du gsal bar bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang med pa'i rnam 'gyur ro zhes pa 'dis med pa sngon ma can nyid du gsal bar bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: Here, by the expression ‚Äúthe transformation of nonexistence,‚Äù it is clearly established that it has a prior nonexistence.

original: phyogs snga ma 'di la grangs can gyis brjod pa /
analyzed: phyogs snga ma 'di la grangs can gyis brjod pa /
translated: In response to this opponent‚Äôs position, the SƒÅ·πÉkhya say:

original: gal te gsal ba thams cad med pa'i rnam par 'gyur bar bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba thams cad med pa'i rnam par 'gyur bar bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: If it is to be established that all manifestations are nonexistent,

original: de ltar gyur na thams cad kyi bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir med pa las yod pa'i bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na thams cad kyi bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir med pa las yod pa'i bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes ba'o //
translated: then, since it would follow that they are all of the nature of nonexistence, it would follow that they would exist from nonexistence.

original: rnam 'gyur thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: rnam 'gyur thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The nature of all manifestations is all of the nature of nonexistence.

original: rang bzhin ni rnam 'gyur gyi rang gi ngo bor mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni rnam 'gyur gyi rang gi ngo bor mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the nature is seen as the nature of the manifestations,

original: de'i rnag gi ngo bor dpag go //
analyzed: de'i rnag gi ngo bor dpag go //
translated: it is inferred that it is the nature of the manifestations.

original: de ltar ni 'o ma'i rnam 'gyur zhol sogs pa rnams de'i bdag nyid rnams te /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'o ma'i rnam 'gyur zhol sogs pa rnams de'i bdag nyid rnams te /
translated: In this way, the manifestations of milk, such as yogurt, are of its nature.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin rnams kho na ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnam gyur rnams so//
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin rnams kho na ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rnam gyur rnams so//
translated: Since they are of the nature of the nature, they are all of the nature of the manifestations.

original: @282b de'i phyir rang bzhin mang thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: @282b de'i phyir rang bzhin mang thams cad kyi bdag nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the nature is all of the nature of all.

original: thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang yod pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir yang yod pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Since it is all of the nature of all, it follows that it exists.

original: med pa ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid du mi 'thad pas so //
analyzed: med pa ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid du mi 'thad pas so //
translated: Because it is not tenable that a non-existent is the nature of all.

original: de las kyang khyad par rnams med pa /
analyzed: de las kyang khyad par rnams med pa /
translated: And from that, the particulars are non-existent.

original: sngon ma can ma'o zhes pa grub pa sgrub pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sngon ma can ma'o zhes pa grub pa sgrub pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe one that has the former‚Äù is an establishment of what is already established.

original: thams cad med pa dang ldan zhes /
analyzed: thams cad med pa dang ldan zhes /
translated: The statement ‚Äúall are endowed with non-existence‚Äù

original: khas len byed pa gang yin zhes pa /
analyzed: khas len byed pa gang yin zhes pa /
translated: is what is accepted.

original: gal te / ba lang la sogs pa'i gsal ba thams cad med pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o zhes smra zhing /
analyzed: gal te / ba lang la sogs pa'i gsal ba thams cad med pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o zhes smra zhing /
translated: If one says that all the manifestations such as cows and so on are the transformation of non-existence,

original: gsal ba thams cad med pa dang ldan no zhes khas len par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsal ba thams cad med pa dang ldan no zhes khas len par byed pa'o //
translated: and accepts that all manifestations are endowed with non-existence,

original: gal te'i sgra ni khas blangs pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gal te'i sgra ni khas blangs pa yongs su gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: the word ‚Äúif‚Äù makes the acceptance clear.üîΩThus,

original: de ltar / grangs can khas len ba can de'i //
analyzed: de ltar / grangs can khas len ba can de'i //
translated: for that SƒÅ·πÉkhya who accepts

original: du ma'i bdag nyid phyir yod pa //
analyzed: du ma'i bdag nyid phyir yod pa //
translated: that all are endowed with non-existence,

original: yin zhes ci zhig ci yis 'brel /
analyzed: yin zhes ci zhig ci yis 'brel /
translated: how could the many be existent?

original: khas blangs pa dang phyi ma ma 'brel lo //
analyzed: khas blangs pa dang phyi ma ma 'brel lo //
translated: The latter is not connected to the acceptance.

original: zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de la ba lang la sogs pa gzhan ci zhig yin zhes pa /
analyzed: de la ba lang la sogs pa gzhan ci zhig yin zhes pa /
translated: What else is there besides cows and so on?

original: phan tshun med pa kho na ni tha snyad pa'i ba lang la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: phan tshun med pa kho na ni tha snyad pa'i ba lang la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: The conventional cow, etc., are only mutually absent.

original: de las tha dad pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: de las tha dad pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: There is no other separate from that.

original: phan tshun med pa yang dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun med pa yang dngos po ma yin te /
translated: And mutual absence is not a thing,

original: brtags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: brtags pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is just an imputation.

original: des na de'i rang bzhin nyid la ci ltar med pa las yod pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: des na de'i rang bzhin nyid la ci ltar med pa las yod pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could its nature be established as existent from non-existence?

original: thams cad ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Everything, etc.

original: ba lang la sogs pa rnams med pa'i bdag nyid du khas len pa la /
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa rnams med pa'i bdag nyid du khas len pa la /
translated: If one accepts that cows, etc. are of the nature of non-existence,

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir med pa ni yod pa'i bdag nyid du 'thob bo zhes pa'i lan rigs pa ni ma yin pas te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi phyir med pa ni yod pa'i bdag nyid du 'thob bo zhes pa'i lan rigs pa ni ma yin pas te /
translated: it is not reasonable to reply that non-existence is established as having the nature of existence because of having that nature.

original: khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it contradicts one's own assertion.

original: gang yang brjod pa zhes pa /
analyzed: gang yang brjod pa zhes pa /
translated: Also, what was said:

original: de la brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de la brjod pa ni /
translated: In response to that, it is said:

original: gal te ba la sogs pa'i gsal ba thams cad med pa'i rnam 'gyur yin na med pa dang yod pa dag las rtogs pa tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te ba la sogs pa'i gsal ba thams cad med pa'i rnam 'gyur yin na med pa dang yod pa dag las rtogs pa tha mi dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If all manifest phenomena such as cows, etc. were non-existent transformations, then the cognition of non-existence and existence would not be different.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rang bzhin gyi rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi rtogs pa ni /
translated: The realization of the nature

original: rnam par 'gyur la mthong ste /
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur la mthong ste /
translated: is seen in the transformation.

original: dper na 'jim pa'i rtogs pa kham phor la bzhin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dper na 'jim pa'i rtogs pa kham phor la bzhin zhes pa'o //
translated: For example, the realization of clay is seen in the pot.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: med pa rjes su 'gro ba la ni de'i rnam pa can kho na'i rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: med pa rjes su 'gro ba la ni de'i rnam pa can kho na'i rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: In the case of the realization of the nonexistent, the realization has the aspect of that alone.

original: ba lang ngo rta'o zhes dngos po tha dad pa'i rnam pa can du ni mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: ba lang ngo rta'o zhes dngos po tha dad pa'i rnam pa can du ni mi 'gyur na /
translated: But in the case of the realization of the existent, the realization has the aspect of a different thing.üîΩFor example, the realization of a cow has the aspect of a cow, and the realization of a horse has the aspect of a horse.

original: 'gyur ba yang ste /
analyzed: 'gyur ba yang ste /
translated: But in the case of the realization of the nonexistent, the realization has the aspect of a different thing.üîΩFor example, the realization of a cow has the aspect of a horse, and the realization of a horse has the aspect of a cow.

original: de'i phyir gsal ba ni med pa rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //üîΩgang zhig gang las tha dad pa'i rnam pa @283a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsal ba ni med pa rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no // gang zhig gang las tha dad pa'i rnam pa @283a * //
translated: Therefore, the manifestation does not realize the nonexistent.

original: can gyi rtogs pas rtogs par bya ba de ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: can gyi rtogs pas rtogs par bya ba de ni de'i bdag nyid ma yin te /
translated: That which is realized by a realization that has the aspect of something different from it is not of the nature of that.

original: dper na ba lang las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba'i rta ni ba lang gi bdag nyid ma yin pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na ba lang las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba'i rta ni ba lang gi bdag nyid ma yin pa bzhin /
translated: For example, a horse, which is to be ascertained by a realization that has the aspect of something different from a cow, is not of the nature of a cow.

original: rnam 'gyur rnams kyang med pa'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur rnams kyang med pa'i rang bzhin las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba'o zhes pa khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: This is a contradiction with the pervasion.

original: 'dis ni med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni ma grub pa nyid du smras so //üîΩ'jim khyad med la kham phor sogs //
analyzed: 'dis ni med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ni ma grub pa nyid du smras so // 'jim khyad med la kham phor sogs //
translated: By this, he says that the nonexistence of the pervaded is not established.

original: blo tha dad pa gal te 'dod //
analyzed: blo tha dad pa gal te 'dod //
translated: If you assert that the cognitionsüîΩof pot and so on are different,

original: ces pa 'jim pa rnams las kha ma phor la sogs pa tha mi dad de /
analyzed: ces pa 'jim pa rnams las kha ma phor la sogs pa tha mi dad de /
translated: then the pot and so on are not different from the clay.

original: de la tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba la gal te rtogs pa tha dad pa tha dad pa 'dod de /
analyzed: de la tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba la gal te rtogs pa tha dad pa tha dad pa 'dod de /
translated: It follows that there would be a cognition that has a form that is not different from that. If you assert that the cognitions are different,

original: 'ji ba la 'ji ba'i rtogs pa dang kham phor la sogs pa la kham phor la sogs pa'i rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'ji ba la 'ji ba'i rtogs pa dang kham phor la sogs pa la kham phor la sogs pa'i rtogs pa'o //
translated: then there is the cognition of clay in clay and the cognition of pot and so on in pot and so on.

original: de ltar gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na /
translated: If that is the case,üîΩthen even though there is no difference in nonexistence,

original: med khyad med na yang ste med pa'i rgyu la tha dad med na yang /
analyzed: med khyad med na yang ste med pa'i rgyu la tha dad med na yang /
translated: that is, even though there is no difference in the cause of nonexistence,

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i gsal ba med pa dang ldan pa la'ang /
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i gsal ba med pa dang ldan pa la'ang /
translated: there would be the possession of nonexistence in the manifestation of cow and so on.

original: tha dad blo ni ste /
analyzed: tha dad blo ni ste /
translated: How can you stop the different cognitionsüîΩsuch as ‚Äúcow‚Äù and ‚Äúhorse‚Äù?

original: ba lang ngo rta'o zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rtogs pa tha dad pa cis bzlog / rnam pa cis zhes pa /
analyzed: ba lang ngo rta'o zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rtogs pa tha dad pa cis bzlog / rnam pa cis zhes pa /
translated: By what aspect?

original: dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis sam /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi khyad par gyis sam /
translated: By the difference in shape,

original: skyes bu'i don gyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: skyes bu'i don gyi dbang gis so //
translated: or by the power of the person‚Äôs purpose.

original: sgra'i khyad par goms pa'i dbang las zhes pa /
analyzed: sgra'i khyad par goms pa'i dbang las zhes pa /
translated: By the power of habituation to the difference in sound,

original: thog ma med par sgra'i tha snyad brgyud pa ni /
analyzed: thog ma med par sgra'i tha snyad brgyud pa ni /
translated: the transmission of the conventional usage of sound is beginningless.

original: sgra'i bye brag gis byas pa de'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa skyed pa'i ched du gang bag chags yin pa de ni sgra'i khyad par goms pa ste /
analyzed: sgra'i bye brag gis byas pa de'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa skyed pa'i ched du gang bag chags yin pa de ni sgra'i khyad par goms pa ste /
translated: The aspect of that which is produced by the difference in sound is the cognition that is generated for the purpose of that. That is the habituation to the difference in sound.

original: de'i dbang las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dbang las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By the power of that, the cognition that has a different aspect is generated.

original: 'dis ni de'i bdag nyid na yang de las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba nyid kham phor la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir ma nges pa nyid du bshad do //
analyzed: 'dis ni de'i bdag nyid na yang de las tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba nyid kham phor la sogs pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir ma nges pa nyid du bshad do //
translated: This explains that it is not certain that if it is of the same nature as that, it is to be ascertained by a cognition that has a different aspect, because it is seen that pots and so on are not ascertained in that way.

original: des na med pa rjes su 'gro ba ni ma grub pa nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na med pa rjes su 'gro ba ni ma grub pa nyid du rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that non-existence is the subsequent mode.

original: gang yod pa las tha mi dad na'ang dngos por yod pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis yongs su bcad pa ba lang la sogs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gang yod pa las tha mi dad na'ang dngos por yod pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis yongs su bcad pa ba lang la sogs pa rnams ni /
translated: If it is not different from existence, it is also an existent thing, and therefore, the determination by direct perception of cows, etc.,

original: sgra goms pa'i dbang las de ltar yongs su bcad pa ste /
analyzed: sgra goms pa'i dbang las de ltar yongs su bcad pa ste /
translated: is a determination from the power of the sound's familiarity.

original: mngon sum du byas pa'i dngos po la sgra'i brda bya bar nus kyi /
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pa'i dngos po la sgra'i brda bya bar nus kyi /
translated: It is possible to make a sound sign for a thing that is made manifest.

original: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible in any other way.üîΩIn order to assert that they are non-existent, how can they be ascertained by a conceptual consciousness that has a different aspect?

original: de rnams kyis med pa nyid du 'dod @283b par bya ba la ni ci ltar tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba nyid yin zhes pa 'di'i phyir na gsungs pa /üîΩkhyod kyi yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis med pa nyid du 'dod @283b par bya ba la ni ci ltar tha dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas nges par bya ba nyid yin zhes pa 'di'i phyir na gsungs pa / khyod kyi yang ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: In order to respond to that, it is said:üîΩEven for you, the nature of the qualities

original: yon tan rnams kyi ngo bo mchog / gang mnyam pa'i gnas skabs na /
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi ngo bo mchog / gang mnyam pa'i gnas skabs na /
translated: When they are in a state of equality,

original: phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin de ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin de ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: that unmistaken nature is beyond the senses.

original: mthong ba yul gyi dngos por nye bar mi 'gro'o //
analyzed: mthong ba yul gyi dngos por nye bar mi 'gro'o //
translated: do not approach the entity of the object seen.

original: gsal ba'i gnas skabs su de rnams kyi ngo bo de ni /
analyzed: gsal ba'i gnas skabs su de rnams kyi ngo bo de ni /
translated: The nature of those in the state of manifestation

original: sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu gsog rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu gsog rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: is like an illusion, completely empty of intrinsic reality.

original: de las kyang khyod kyang dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyu can ma yin pa kho nar tha snyad khas blang bar bya'o zhes pas brtsad pa mtshungs so //
analyzed: de las kyang khyod kyang dngos po'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyu can ma yin pa kho nar tha snyad khas blang bar bya'o zhes pas brtsad pa mtshungs so //
translated: And from that, you also should accept that the conventional is not caused by the reality of things, so the dispute is similar.

original: lkog shal la sogs pa mthong phyir //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa mthong phyir //
translated: Because of seeing the dewlap, etc.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa de la 'jig pa smra ba pa yis brjod pa /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa de la 'jig pa smra ba pa yis brjod pa /
translated: To that, the annihilationist says:

original: gang zhig mthong ba las gang zhes 'jig rten na rtogs par 'gyur ba de kho na der 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang zhig mthong ba las gang zhes 'jig rten na rtogs par 'gyur ba de kho na der 'gyur te /
translated: Whatever is understood in the world from seeing is just that.

original: dper na lkog shal la sogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i lkog shal la sogs pa kho na ni ba lang yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na lkog shal la sogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i lkog shal la sogs pa kho na ni ba lang yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, just the dewlap, etc., which is understood as an ox from seeing the dewlap, etc., is an ox.

original: don gzhan la rtogs pa yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan la rtogs pa yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las yin te /
translated: The cognition of another object is also from seeing the absence of one‚Äôs own self.

original: de'i phyir don gzhan med pa kho na bdag nyid gzhan rnams so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gzhan med pa kho na bdag nyid gzhan rnams so zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, only the absence of another object is the other selves.

original: 'dis ni gang mthong ba las gang rtogs par 'gyur ba de kho na der 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni gang mthong ba las gang rtogs par 'gyur ba de kho na der 'gyur te /
translated: This shows the result: that which is cognized from seeing that is just that.

original: dper na lkog shal la sogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i lkog shal la sogs pa rnams kho na ba lang yin pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na lkog shal la sogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i lkog shal la sogs pa rnams kho na ba lang yin pa bzhin /
translated: For example, just those things such as the dewlap that are cognized as an ox from seeing the dewlap and so on are an ox.üîΩThe cognition of another self is also from seeing the absence of one‚Äôs own self.

original: bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs pa yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las 'gyur ro zhes 'bras bu gsungs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs pa yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las 'gyur ro zhes 'bras bu gsungs so //
translated: This is the result.

original: 'di grangs can pas slar bsgrub par bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di grangs can pas slar bsgrub par bshad pa /
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhya explains this as a counter-argument:

original: gal te lkog shal la sogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te lkog shal la sogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: If the cognition of an ox were from seeing the dewlap and so on,üîΩthen the cognition of a horse would also arise from seeing the dewlap and so on.

original: de ltar gyur na bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes gang brjod pa de mi rigs te zhes so //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes gang brjod pa de mi rigs te zhes so //
translated: Thus, it is illogical to say that ‚Äúone sees the self as other than itself,‚Äù and that ‚Äúone realizes the self as other than itself.‚Äù

original: bdag nyid gzhan med pa'i rgyu mtshan can du rtogs pa thams cad khas len na /
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan med pa'i rgyu mtshan can du rtogs pa thams cad khas len na /
translated: If one accepts that all realizations have the self as their reason,

original: ci ltar ba lang gi rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan lkog shal la sogs pa nyid yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ci ltar ba lang gi rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan lkog shal la sogs pa nyid yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: then why is the reason for the realization of an ox just the dewlap and so on?

original: 'dis ni khas blangs pa nyams pa smras te /
analyzed: 'dis ni khas blangs pa nyams pa smras te /
translated: This shows the contradiction of accepting the example.

original: dpe la rang gi phyogs btang ba'i phyir ro @284a * //
analyzed: dpe la rang gi phyogs btang ba'i phyir ro @284a * //
translated: Because one abandons one‚Äôs own position with respect to the example.

original: zhes pa grub mtha' dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa grub mtha' dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it contradicts one‚Äôs tenets.

original: khyod kyis 'dod pas zhes pa /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'dod pas zhes pa /
translated: Because of what you assert

original: khyod kyis ni lkog shal la sogs pa rnams kho na ba lang ngo zhes 'dod pas so //
analyzed: khyod kyis ni lkog shal la sogs pa rnams kho na ba lang ngo zhes 'dod pas so //
translated: you assert that just the dewlap and so on are the ox.

original: kho bo cag gi 'dod pas ni phan tshun bsal bya de tha dad de /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi 'dod pas ni phan tshun bsal bya de tha dad de /
translated: Because of what we assert, the other is excluded from it.

original: ba lang dang lkog shal la sogs pa rnams ni 'di rnams la gsal bar bya ba tha dad pa'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: ba lang dang lkog shal la sogs pa rnams ni 'di rnams la gsal bar bya ba tha dad pa'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: The cow, dewlap, and so on are the different things that are clarified.

original: gang gi ni zhes pa sel ba smra ba'i'o //
analyzed: gang gi ni zhes pa sel ba smra ba'i'o //
translated: Whose? Of the proponent of exclusion.

original: khas blangs nas zhes pa la sogs pa khyod kyi ni lkog shal la sogs pa tshogs pa kho na la ba lang ngo zhes 'dod de /
analyzed: khas blangs nas zhes pa la sogs pa khyod kyi ni lkog shal la sogs pa tshogs pa kho na la ba lang ngo zhes 'dod de /
translated: Having accepted, etc. You accept that the mere collection of the dewlap, etc. is the cow.

original: de'i phyir de khas blangs nas dpe 'di rang gi 'dod pa dang 'gal ba yang brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de khas blangs nas dpe 'di rang gi 'dod pa dang 'gal ba yang brjod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, having accepted that, this example is also stated as contradicting your own belief.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: ji ltar khyod kyi lkog shal la sogs pa tshogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs pa yin pa de ltar nged kyi yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa ma mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar khyod kyi lkog shal la sogs pa tshogs pa mthong ba las ba lang gi rtogs pa yin pa de ltar nged kyi yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa ma mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Just as you understand the cow from seeing the collection of the dewlap, etc., so we also understand the other self from not seeing the other self.

original: sgra tha dad pa las ni zhes pa la sogs pa lkog shal la sogs pa sgra'i ni lkog shal la sogs pa rnams la lkog shal la sogs ma yin pa bsal bya ste /
analyzed: sgra tha dad pa las ni zhes pa la sogs pa lkog shal la sogs pa sgra'i ni lkog shal la sogs pa rnams la lkog shal la sogs ma yin pa bsal bya ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFrom different words‚Äù and so on. The words ‚Äúdewlap‚Äù and so on exclude non-dewlap and so on with regard to dewlap and so on.

original: ba lang gi sgra'i yang ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa bsal bya'o //
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra'i yang ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa bsal bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúcow‚Äù excludes non-cow with regard to cow.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar bsal bya tha dad pa de'i phyir lkog shal la sogs pa rnams la lkog shal la sogs pa ma yin pa sel bas lkog shal la sogs pa'i rtogs pa dang ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa rnam par gcod pas ba langüîΩgi rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar bsal bya tha dad pa de'i phyir lkog shal la sogs pa rnams la lkog shal la sogs pa ma yin pa sel bas lkog shal la sogs pa'i rtogs pa dang ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa rnam par gcod pas ba lang gi rtogs pa'o //
translated: Since the exclusions are different in this way, the understanding of dewlap and so on is by way of excluding non-dewlap and so on with regard to dewlap and so on, and the understanding of cow is by way of excluding non-cow with regard to cow.

original: de ltar na 'dir yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba kho na las bdag nyid gzhan pa lang la rtogs pa rang gi 'dod pas so zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir yang bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba kho na las bdag nyid gzhan pa lang la rtogs pa rang gi 'dod pas so zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams pa med do //
translated: Thus, in this case also, the understanding of cow as other than self is by way of seeing the absence of self in other, as you assert. Therefore, there is no fault of contradicting your own assertions.

original: de mi ltos zhes pa la sogs pa ni grangs can pas bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las kyang bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa ma grub pa nyid du bstan pa'i ched du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de mi ltos zhes pa la sogs pa ni grangs can pas bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las kyang bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa ma grub pa nyid du bstan pa'i ched du bshad pa'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúit does not depend on that‚Äù and so on are stated in order to demonstrate that the SƒÅ·πÉkhya‚Äôs claim that ‚Äúthe self is perceived as other‚Äù is not established.

original: de ltos med /
analyzed: de ltos med /
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not depend on that‚Äù

original: bdag nyid gzhan rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan rtogs pa'o //
translated: means ‚Äúthe self is perceived as other.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩnged kyi ni bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / nged kyi ni bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Why is that?üîΩIt is not that for us the self is perceived as other.

original: 'o na ci zhe na sgrub pa'i ngo bo kho nas ba lang zhes so //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na sgrub pa'i ngo bo kho nas ba lang zhes so //
translated: But rather, the self is perceived as other due to the nature of the proof, as in ‚Äúcow.‚Äù

original: rang gi rnam par rtog pas sprul ba zhes pa 'di ni rang gi rnam par rtog pas dbye bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rnam par rtog pas sprul ba zhes pa 'di ni rang gi rnam par rtog pas dbye bar byas pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is fabricated by one‚Äôs own thought‚Äù means it is distinguished by one‚Äôs own thought.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur @284b te ;
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur @284b te ;
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang las 'di ni 'di ltar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang las 'di ni 'di ltar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is expressed in this way due to the power of one‚Äôs own thought.‚Äù

original: rigs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa ni ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not logical.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: sel ba med par zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sel ba med par zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout the exclusion‚Äù and so on.

original: lkog shal la sogs pa rnams la ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di kho na'i 'grel pa'o //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa rnams la ni zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'di kho na'i 'grel pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe words ‚Äòwithershins‚Äô and so on‚Äù and so forth is the commentary on just this.

original: lkog shal la sogs pa'i sgra ni spyi'i ngo bor rang gi don rtogs par byed de /üîΩde yang spyi'i ngo bo rtogs pa na don gzhan med pa la mi ltos par mi 'gyur ro zhes sngar bsgrubs zin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: lkog shal la sogs pa'i sgra ni spyi'i ngo bor rang gi don rtogs par byed de / de yang spyi'i ngo bo rtogs pa na don gzhan med pa la mi ltos par mi 'gyur ro zhes sngar bsgrubs zin pa kho na'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúwithershins‚Äù and so on make one understand one‚Äôs own object in the form of a universal.üîΩAnd it has been proven above that when one understands a universal, one does not depend on the non-existence of another object.

original: 'o na dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni don gzhan med pa rtogs pa la mi ltos pa ba lang zhes sgrub ba kho nas 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs pa ni don gzhan med pa rtogs pa la mi ltos pa ba lang zhes sgrub ba kho nas 'gyur ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: ‚ÄúBut the understanding of the own-character of an entity does not depend on the understanding of the non-existence of another object.‚ÄùüîΩHe says:

original: rang gi ngo bo ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe own-nature‚Äù and so on.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni rang gi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni rang gi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The own-nature is the own-character.

original: de rtogs pa na gal te don gzhan med pa ltos par bya ba ma yin mod /
analyzed: de rtogs pa na gal te don gzhan med pa ltos par bya ba ma yin mod /
translated: When one understands that, one does not have to depend on the non-existence of another object.

original: de brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not to be expressed.

original: brjod par bya ba tha snyad pa'i ngo bo ni pa lang la sogs pa rnams la don gzhan sel ba la mi ltos par rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba tha snyad pa'i ngo bo ni pa lang la sogs pa rnams la don gzhan sel ba la mi ltos par rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the conventional object of expression is not understood in relation to cows and so on without relying on the exclusion of other objects.

original: de yang rnam par dpyad pa'i ched du skabs su byas pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam par dpyad pa'i ched du skabs su byas pa'o //
translated: And that is the topic under consideration for the purpose of analysis.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason is not unestablished.

original: gang brjod pa zhes pa /
analyzed: gang brjod pa zhes pa /
translated: What is expressed?

original: 'di skad du brjod de /
analyzed: 'di skad du brjod de /
translated: This is said:

original: gal te bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: If one understands the other in relation to the self through seeing the absence of the self in the other,

original: dang po'i rtogs pa 'jug pa med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: dang po'i rtogs pa 'jug pa med pa kho na ste /
translated: then the initial understanding would not occur at all.

original: ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de la bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de la bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
translated: Because there would be no seeing the absence of the self in the other.

original: 'dir dang po'i rtogs pa ni gang 'khor bar thog mar skyes pa ste de med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir dang po'i rtogs pa ni gang 'khor bar thog mar skyes pa ste de med pa'o //
translated: Here, the initial understanding is the first arising in cyclic existence, and that would not exist.

original: de'i tshe gzhan gyi bdag nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan gyi bdag nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: At that time, because the other's self would not be seen,

original: bdag nyid gzhan yang ma bzung bas /
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan yang ma bzung bas /
translated: the self would not apprehend the other.

original: de med pas nye bar mtshon pa'i bdag nyid gzhan yang gzung bar mi nus so zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
analyzed: de med pas nye bar mtshon pa'i bdag nyid gzhan yang gzung bar mi nus so zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
translated: Since that is not possible, it is not possible to apprehend any other nature that is illustrated by that. Thus, your assertion is undermined.

original: thog ma med phyir 'dod pa grub //
analyzed: thog ma med phyir 'dod pa grub //
translated: [We reply:] Since there is no beginning, your assertion is established.

original: ces pa 'di ni 'dod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: ces pa 'di ni 'dod pa kho na ste /
translated: This is just your assertion.

original: dang po'i rtogs pa khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po'i rtogs pa khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you do not accept the first realization.üîΩTherefore, your assertion is not undermined. This is the meaning.üîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe response

original: de'i phyir khas blangs pa nyams pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir khas blangs pa nyams pa ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The response

original: gang gi yang zhes pa la sogs pas pha rol po kho na la skyon 'di slar thal bar 'gyur bar byed do //üîΩrigs dang ldan pa la khyab par nus pa ma yin zhes pa /
analyzed: gang gi yang zhes pa la sogs pas pha rol po kho na la skyon 'di slar thal bar 'gyur bar byed do // rigs dang ldan pa la khyab par nus pa ma yin zhes pa /
translated: The responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe response

original: gal te khyad par thams @285a * //
analyzed: gal te khyad par thams @285a * //
translated: The responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe response

analyzed: cad la sgra sbyar bar nus pa nyid na / de lta na rigs dang ldan pa'i dngos po sgras khyad par nus mod /
