analyzed: de srid pa ma yin te /
translated: The responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe responseüîΩThe response

original: rigs dang ldan pa rnams mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs dang ldan pa rnams mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The

original: 'brel pa ma byas par sgras rtogs par nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa ma byas par sgras rtogs par nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not possible to understand a word without making a connection.üîΩGranted that this is so, but because it is one, it is possible for the universal to pervade.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir rigs kyis khyab par nus so zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi gcig yin pa nyid kyi phyir rigs kyis khyab par nus so zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: To this he says,

original: yang min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yang min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Nor is it possible, etc.

original: khyab par nus pa zhes dkyus ma dang sbrel lo //
analyzed: khyab par nus pa zhes dkyus ma dang sbrel lo //
translated: The word ‚Äúpossible‚Äù is to be supplied from the preceding line.

original: gal te re zhig rten las tha dad pa'i rigs ni rten mtha' dag la 'jug par rtog na ;
analyzed: gal te re zhig rten las tha dad pa'i rigs ni rten mtha' dag la 'jug par rtog na ;
translated: If you imagine that the universal, which is different from the individual, pervades all the individual members,

original: de'i tshe gnyis nyid la sogs pa bzhin du rten mthong ba sngon du 'gro bar de mthong bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de'i tshe gnyis nyid la sogs pa bzhin du rten mthong ba sngon du 'gro bar de mthong bar 'gyur na /
translated: then, like duality, etc., it would be perceived only when the individual is perceived.

original: rten rnams ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir mthong ba srid pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rten rnams ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir mthong ba srid pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But since the individual members are infinite, it is impossible to perceive all of them.

original: ci ste rten so so la bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir rten gcig mthong na yang 'dzin par 'dod na de'i tshe tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste rten so so la bdag nyid thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir rten gcig mthong na yang 'dzin par 'dod na de'i tshe tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if you maintain that when one individual is perceived, it is apprehended because it is completely fulfilled in each individual, then it would be different.

original: de las kyang rten dang 'dra bar mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang rten dang 'dra bar mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir 'brel pa med pa'o //
translated: Moreover, because of being infinite like the basis, there is no relation.

original: ci ste rten las tha mi dad na de ltar na yang khyad par lta bu'i skyon te /
analyzed: ci ste rten las tha mi dad na de ltar na yang khyad par lta bu'i skyon te /
translated: But if it is not different from the basis, then in that case, there is the fault of being like a distinction.

original: khyad par rnams las tha mi dad pa ni de kho na bzhin du mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: khyad par rnams las tha mi dad pa ni de kho na bzhin du mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: Because of being infinite just like the distinctions, it is not different from the distinctions.

original: / de ltar rigs smra ba kho na la dang po'i rtogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de ltar rigs smra ba kho na la dang po'i rtogs pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it follows that the first cognition would not exist for the proponent of the theory.

original: gang yang brjod pa zhes pa gal te bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang yang brjod pa zhes pa gal te bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: And also, as for what was said, ‚ÄúIf one sees the absence of another nature, then one would cognize another nature.üîΩ‚Äù

original: rtogs pa 'jug pa nyid med de /
analyzed: rtogs pa 'jug pa nyid med de /
translated: There is no engagement of cognition.

original: ci'i phyir na bsal bar bya ba bdag nyid gzhan mtha' yas ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir na bsal bar bya ba bdag nyid gzhan mtha' yas ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Why? Because of the infinite number of other natures that are to be excluded.

original: bdag nyid gzhan thams cad med pa mthong ba med do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan thams cad med pa mthong ba med do zhes pa'o //
translated: One does not see the absence of all other natures.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: gal te bdag nyid gzhan rnams thams cad bsal bas rtogs pa yin na ba lang ma yin pa'i don de rnams mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid gzhan rnams thams cad bsal bas rtogs pa yin na ba lang ma yin pa'i don de rnams mtha' yas pa nyid kyi phyir mi mthong ste /
translated: If the self is understood by the exclusion of all others, then since the referents that are not oxen are limitless, they are not seen.

original: ba lang gi khyad par bzhin no //
analyzed: ba lang gi khyad par bzhin no //
translated: Like the particularities of the ox.

original: de las kyang de bsal bas ba lang rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de las kyang de bsal bas ba lang rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: And also, the ox is not understood by the exclusion of those,

original: de kho na bzhin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin zhes pa'o //
translated: just like that.

original: gang rnams mtha' yas ba de rnams thams cad mthong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rnams mtha' yas ba de rnams thams cad mthong ba ma yin te /
translated: Those that are limitless are not all seen,

original: ba lang gi khyad par bzhin bsal bya rnams kyang @285b mtha' yas pa nyid do //
analyzed: ba lang gi khyad par bzhin bsal bya rnams kyang @285b mtha' yas pa nyid do //
translated: like the particularities of the ox. The referents to be excluded are also limitless.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The pervasion is contradicted.

original: gang mtha' yas ba nyid ni de bsal bas lang rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang mtha' yas ba nyid ni de bsal bas lang rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is limitless is not understood by the exclusion of that,

original: dper na ba lang gi khyad par rnams mtha' yas pa nyid de bsal bas ba lang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba bzhin /
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi khyad par rnams mtha' yas pa nyid de bsal bas ba lang rtogs par mi 'gyur ba bzhin /
translated: just like the particularities of the ox, which are limitless, are not understood by the exclusion of the ox.

original: ba lang ma yin pa'i don rnams kyang mtha' yas ba nyid do //
analyzed: ba lang ma yin pa'i don rnams kyang mtha' yas ba nyid do //
translated: The referents that are not oxen are also limitless.

original: khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab byed dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The pervasion is contradicted.

original: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang khas blangs pa nyams pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is a violation of your own assertion.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: And that is not reasonable.

original: ci las she na /
analyzed: ci las she na /
translated: Why?

original: spyi yis nges par sel ba'i phyir //
analyzed: spyi yis nges par sel ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of the exclusion by the general nature.

original: shing ma yin du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing ma yin du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not that it is not a tree.

original: zhes pa 'di ltar spyi'i ngo bos nges par sel ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde ni gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩgang gi phyir shing gi sgra de ni rigs gzhan bum pa la sogs pa rnams rdzas so sor 'di bum par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ltar sel ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes pa 'di ltar spyi'i ngo bos nges par sel ba'i phyir ro // de ni gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa ste / gang gi phyir shing gi sgra de ni rigs gzhan bum pa la sogs pa rnams rdzas so sor 'di bum par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di ltar sel ba ma yin gyi /
translated: In this way, because of the exclusion by the general nature,üîΩit is not that the word tree does not exclude other types such as pots,üîΩsaying, This is a tree, not a pot.

original: 'o na ci zhe na rnam par gcad byar brjod par 'dod pas spyi'i chos gcig gis so //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na rnam par gcad byar brjod par 'dod pas spyi'i chos gcig gis so //
translated: But rather, it is said that the word tree is asserted to be an exclusion of the other types of pots and so on, which are substances, by means of a single general quality.

original: spyi'i chos gcig po gang rnam par gcad byar brjod par 'dod pa nges te rgyur gyur pas sel par byed do //
analyzed: spyi'i chos gcig po gang rnam par gcad byar brjod par 'dod pa nges te rgyur gyur pas sel par byed do //
translated: A single general quality is asserted to be an exclusion of what is to be excluded because it is the cause of that.

original: ci'i phyir sel zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir sel zhe na /
translated: Why is it an exclusion?

original: skabs gzhan du bstan pa'i phyir de kho na'i spyi'i chos kyis so zhes rnam par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: skabs gzhan du bstan pa'i phyir de kho na'i spyi'i chos kyis so zhes rnam par shes par bya'o //
translated: Because it is taught in other contexts, it should be understood that it is by means of the general quality of that alone.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: spyi'i chos rnam par gcad byar brjod par 'dod pas thob pa'i tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo rnams shing du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gcad par bya ba rnams sel bar byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i chos rnam par gcad byar brjod par 'dod pas thob pa'i tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo rnams shing du mi 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di lta bu bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par gcad par bya ba rnams sel bar byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: Since the general property is what is to be eliminated, the entities that are not different from what is obtained are not trees. Thus, the eliminations of pot and so on are eliminated.

original: de'i phyir shing ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa ni mtha' yas pa nyid du ma grub ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir shing ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa ni mtha' yas pa nyid du ma grub ste /
translated: Therefore, non-tree and so on are not established as infinite,

original: spyi'i ngo bo tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
analyzed: spyi'i ngo bo tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro ;
translated: because the general entity is not different.

original: /'di la yang bshad pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: /'di la yang bshad pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, the explanation is as follows:

original: sgra gzhan don ni ma mthong phyir //
analyzed: sgra gzhan don ni ma mthong phyir //
translated: Because the meaning of the other word is not seen.

original: zhes pa 'dir bshad do //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir bshad do //
translated: This is explained here.

original: rigs mi mthun la ma mthong ba tsam gyis rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun la ma mthong ba tsam gyis rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa /
translated: The mere non-seeing of dissimilar types is inference.

original: gang zhig gang la ma mthong ba de ni de sel bar byed cing /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la ma mthong ba de ni de sel bar byed cing /
translated: Whatever is not seen in something, that eliminates it.

original: shing gi sgra yang rang gi don med pa'i rigs mi mthun la ma mthong ba ste /
analyzed: shing gi sgra yang rang gi don med pa'i rigs mi mthun la ma mthong ba ste /
translated: The word tree is not seen in dissimilar types that do not have their own meaning.

original: rgyu med na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med na 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if there is no cause, there is no effect.

original: de'i phyir mtha' yas pa nyid yod na yang rjes su dpog pa 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtha' yas pa nyid yod na yang rjes su dpog pa 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, even if there is infinity, inference is tenable.

original: nyes pa 'di ni khyod nyid la //
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni khyod nyid la //
translated: This fault is yours alone.

original: zhes pa rtogs pa 'jug pa med pa'i skyon no //
analyzed: zhes pa rtogs pa 'jug pa med pa'i skyon no //
translated: This is the fault of the non-engagement of understanding.

original: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How so? It is said:

original: gal te rang gi rigs mthun la @286a * //
analyzed: gal te rang gi rigs mthun la @286a * //
translated: If it is pervasion by its own homogeneous

original: khyab pas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /üîΩgang gi sgrub pas rtogs par byed pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo'o zhes pas /
analyzed: khyab pas zhes pa la sogs pa ste / gang gi sgrub pas rtogs par byed pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba gtso bo'o zhes pas /
translated: kind, etc.

original: rang gi rigs mthun pa mtha' dag la khyab par sgras 'jug bar bya ni /
analyzed: rang gi rigs mthun pa mtha' dag la khyab par sgras 'jug bar bya ni /
translated: Since it is the principal concomitance of that which is to be established by the proof, it is said that the word should engage in pervasion of all of its own homogeneous kind.

original: de yang mi srid de /
analyzed: de yang mi srid de /
translated: Moreover, that is impossible,

original: rigs mthun pa rnams mtha' med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rigs ni de rnams dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa rnams mtha' med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rigs ni de rnams dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: because the homogeneous kinds are infinite and because the kind is not different from them.

original: de'i phyir dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said, for example, etc.

original: rva can nyid ni rta las ldog bzhin pas rta ma yin pa nyid rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rva can nyid ni rta las ldog bzhin pas rta ma yin pa nyid rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Since the horn-ness is being excluded from the horse, the non-horseness is to be understood.

original: de yang dngos por yod pa'i spyi smra ba rnams kyis kyang rta ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i dngos por yod pa'i spyi dam bcas pa cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: de yang dngos por yod pa'i spyi smra ba rnams kyis kyang rta ma yin pa nyid ces bya ba'i dngos por yod pa'i spyi dam bcas pa cung zad kyang med do //
translated: Moreover, even those who speak of a universal that exists as a thing do not at all accept a universal that exists as a thing called ‚Äúnon-horse.‚Äù

original: gang rnams rta ma yin pa ba lang la sogs pa de rnams kyang rva can nyid kyis so sor khyab bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gang rnams rta ma yin pa ba lang la sogs pa de rnams kyang rva can nyid kyis so sor khyab bar mi byed do //
translated: Those that are not horses, such as cows, do not individually pervade with their horns.

original: gang rnams de dang rigs mi mthun ba rta de rnams kyang so sor mi sel ba kho na'o //üîΩde ste yang de la ji ltar spyi rigs mi mthun pa bsgribs pa'i phyir rtar mi 'gyur ro zhes ldog pa'i blor 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang rnams de dang rigs mi mthun ba rta de rnams kyang so sor mi sel ba kho na'o // de ste yang de la ji ltar spyi rigs mi mthun pa bsgribs pa'i phyir rtar mi 'gyur ro zhes ldog pa'i blor 'gyur zhing /
translated: Those that are not of that type, such as horses, are not individually excluded.üîΩIf it is said, ‚ÄúIt is not a horse because the universal of horse is obscured,‚Äù then the cognition of exclusion would occur.

original: rta las log pa'i ba lang la sogs pa rnams la spyi'i rnam pas rta ma yin pa'o zhes rjes su 'jug pa'i blo yang yin pa /
analyzed: rta las log pa'i ba lang la sogs pa rnams la spyi'i rnam pas rta ma yin pa'o zhes rjes su 'jug pa'i blo yang yin pa /
translated: And if it is said, ‚ÄúIt is not a horse because of the universal of cow,‚Äù then the cognition of inclusion would occur with respect to cows and so on that are the opposite of horse.

original: de ltar 'dir rigs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir rigs pa ste /
translated: Thus it is reasonable that

original: sgra yang rtags dang ldan ba las ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra las kyang /
analyzed: sgra yang rtags dang ldan ba las ba lang la sogs pa'i sgra las kyang /
translated: the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is applied to a cow that possesses a dewlap and so on.

original: ba lang la sogs pa la rjes su 'jug pa'i blo yin zhing /
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa la rjes su 'jug pa'i blo yin zhing /
translated: It is the cognition that engages with cows and so on.üîΩ

original: ba lang ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ldog pa'i blor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba lang ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ldog pa'i blor 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition that engages with cows and so on is the cognition that excludes noncows and so on.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: gang rtags yin pa de ni spyir rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcod par byed cing rang gi don rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: gang rtags yin pa de ni spyir rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcod par byed cing rang gi don rtogs par byed de /
translated: That which is a reason is in general a reason that excludes dissimilar types and causes one to understand one‚Äôs own object,

original: dper na rva can nyid bzhin sgra yang rtags yin no zhes pa rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rva can nyid bzhin sgra yang rtags yin no zhes pa rang bzhin no //
translated: like the reason of having horns. Sound is a reason. This is the nature of the reason.

original: gang yang gal te bdag nyid gzhan med ba mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la ltos par 'gyur na bdag nyid gzhan med pa yang gcig pu ste /
analyzed: gang yang gal te bdag nyid gzhan med ba mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la ltos par 'gyur na bdag nyid gzhan med pa yang gcig pu ste /
translated: If something that is seen to be without another nature were to depend on another nature, then that which is without another nature would be one.

original: de las bdag nyid gzhan thams cad la ltos pa gcig tu thal bar 'gyur zhing thams cad tshul gcig ba can gyi rtogs pas rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las bdag nyid gzhan thams cad la ltos pa gcig tu thal bar 'gyur zhing thams cad tshul gcig ba can gyi rtogs pas rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: From that it would follow that all other natures would be one, and all would be understood by a single cognition,

original: bye brag gi gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag gi gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the oneness of the particulars.

original: ji ltar dkar po nyid kyi khyad par tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar dkar po nyid kyi khyad par tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Just as, because of the non-difference of the particular of whiteness,

original: ku mu da dang dung ni dkar po'o zhes ku mud @286b la sogs pa rnams tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas rtogs par bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ku mu da dang dung ni dkar po'o zhes ku mud @286b la sogs pa rnams tha mi dad pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pas rtogs par bya ba bzhin no //
translated: the cognition of the lily, etc. is not different, as in the case of the cognition, ‚ÄúThe lily and the conch are white.‚Äù

original: ci ste bdag nyid gzhan med pa gcig ma yin na //
analyzed: ci ste bdag nyid gzhan med pa gcig ma yin na //
translated: But if the self is not one without another self,

original: de las so so'i bdag nyid la rtogs pa sna tshogs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las so so'i bdag nyid la rtogs pa sna tshogs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that there would be a variety of cognitions of individual selves,

original: sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the reasons for the application of the word would be different.

original: khar ni dkar ba mngar ba dri zhim pa la bsil ba'o zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: khar ni dkar ba mngar ba dri zhim pa la bsil ba'o zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Just as, for example, in the case of ‚Äúwhite,‚Äù ‚Äúsweet,‚Äù ‚Äúfragrant,‚Äù and ‚Äúcool.‚Äù

original: 'di gnyis ka mi 'dod ces pa khas blangs pa nyams pa'o zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka mi 'dod ces pa khas blangs pa nyams pa'o zhes brjod pa /
translated: If you say that both of these are unacceptable, you have lost your position.

original: de la slar sgrub pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la slar sgrub pa gsungs pa /
translated: In response to this, the opponent‚Äôs position is stated:

original: bdag nyid gzhan med khas blangs nas //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan med khas blangs nas //
translated: Having accepted that the self is not another,

original: gcig dang du ma nyid rtogs pa //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma nyid rtogs pa //
translated: the understanding of one and many

original: rigs min zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rigs min zhes pa ste /
translated: is not tenable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang phyir dngos po 'di la 'gyur ro zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: gang phyir dngos po 'di la 'gyur ro zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is: ‚Äúbecause this entity would be so.‚Äù

original: gcig nyid dang du ma nyid ni dngos po kho na la srid kyi dngos por med pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid dang du ma nyid ni dngos po kho na la srid kyi dngos por med pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: Singularity and multiplicity are possible only for entities, not for what is not an entity.

original: gzhan med pa de khas blangs nas gcig dang gcig shos ma yin pa nyid rtag par mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan med pa de khas blangs nas gcig dang gcig shos ma yin pa nyid rtag par mi rigs so //
translated: Having accepted the absence of another, it is not tenable that singularity and difference are permanent.üîΩAnd also:

original: gang yang / rigs kyi chos ni rnam gnas phyir //
analyzed: gang yang / rigs kyi chos ni rnam gnas phyir //
translated: Because the property of the class remains.

original: zhes pa 'dir gzhan sel ba gcig nyid du rnam par gzhag pa de ni blo'i snang ba la brten nas nye bar btags pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir gzhan sel ba gcig nyid du rnam par gzhag pa de ni blo'i snang ba la brten nas nye bar btags pa'o //
translated: Here, the establishment of the exclusion of other as singularity is imputed in dependence on the appearance of cognition.

original: khyod kyi'ang bsal min nus rnams las //
analyzed: khyod kyi'ang bsal min nus rnams las //
translated: And also for you, the same consequence would apply to the potencies that are not excluded.

original: thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The remainder is: ‚Äúit is similar.‚Äù

original: bsal bar min pa ni yon tan rnams mnyam pa yi gnas skabs gtso bo ste /
analyzed: bsal bar min pa ni yon tan rnams mnyam pa yi gnas skabs gtso bo ste /
translated: That which is not excluded is the primary state of the equality of the qualities.

original: de la chen po la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur gyi nus pa rnams gcig nyid na rgyu tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir rnam 'gyur tha dad par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de la chen po la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur gyi nus pa rnams gcig nyid na rgyu tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir rnam 'gyur tha dad par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: If that is singular, then the evolutes such as Mahat and so on would not be different because the cause would not be different.

original: tha dad pa nyid na gtso bo gcig nyid du 'gal bar nus pa rnams las gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid na gtso bo gcig nyid du 'gal bar nus pa rnams las gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: If they are different, it is contradictory for them to be one principal nature, because they are not different from the capacities.

original: nus pa de rnams dngos por yod pa kho nar zhes khas blang bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nus pa de rnams dngos por yod pa kho nar zhes khas blang bar nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not possible to accept that those capacities exist as real entities,

original: gcig dang gcig min nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig dang gcig min nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is contradictory for something to be both one and not one.

original: gang yang gal te bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs pa ni dbang po las byung ba yang ngo zhes pas /
analyzed: gang yang gal te bdag nyid gzhan med pa mthong ba las bdag nyid gzhan la rtogs pa ni dbang po las byung ba yang ngo zhes pas /
translated: Also, if it is understood that another nature is seen in the absence of another nature, then it is also the case that the sense faculties arise.

original: med pa ni sgra la sogs pa rnams las gang yang rung bar 'thob ste /
analyzed: med pa ni sgra la sogs pa rnams las gang yang rung bar 'thob ste /
translated: It is obtained from any of the nonexistent sounds and so on,

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i gzung bya nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i gzung bya nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are the objects of the ears and so on.

original: ci ste sgra la sogs pa rnams las gang yang rung ba ma yin @287a * //
analyzed: ci ste sgra la sogs pa rnams las gang yang rung ba ma yin @287a * //
translated: If it is said that it is not obtained from any of the sounds and so on,

original: no ; / de'i 'dzin pa po dbang po drug la yod do zhes pa 'di 'ongs na /
analyzed: no ; / de'i 'dzin pa po dbang po drug la yod do zhes pa 'di 'ongs na /
translated: but rather that its apprehender exists among the six sense faculties,

original: 'di gnyis ka yang 'dod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba brjod pa de'i lan 'di ste /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka yang 'dod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba brjod pa de'i lan 'di ste /
translated: then the response to that is that both of these are unacceptable.

original: sgra'i brjod bya'i don la 'di //
analyzed: sgra'i brjod bya'i don la 'di //
translated: The meaning of the term is this.

original: bsam bya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bsam bya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The object of thought, etc.

original: mngon sum gyi don ni bstan du med pa zhes pa so sor rang gis rig par bya ba brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi don ni bstan du med pa zhes pa so sor rang gis rig par bya ba brjod du med pa'o //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúperception‚Äù is ‚Äúnot manifest,‚Äù that is, it is to be known by each one for himself, and is inexpressible.

original: bstan par bya ba'ang rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'ang rtogs pa ste /
translated: The object of expression is also to be understood.

original: gang 'di skad du bdag nyid gzhan med pa ni bdag nyid gzhan no zhes brjod pa de ni bstan par bya zhing brjod par bya ba'i don gyi ngor bshad kyi dbang po'i spyod yul ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang 'di skad du bdag nyid gzhan med pa ni bdag nyid gzhan no zhes brjod pa de ni bstan par bya zhing brjod par bya ba'i don gyi ngor bshad kyi dbang po'i spyod yul ni ma yin no //
translated: That which is said to be ‚Äúwithout another self‚Äù is the other self. This is to be expressed and is explained from the point of view of the object of expression, but it is not the domain of the senses.

original: de'i phyir 'di mngon sum pa dbang po'i spyod yul 'phen par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di mngon sum pa dbang po'i spyod yul 'phen par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to infer that this is a manifest object, the domain of the senses,

original: de bstan du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bstan du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not manifest.

original: de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: Therefore, the previously mentioned fault does not arise.

original: dmigs kyis dgar ba tshig gi 'di zhes pa dmigs kyis dgar ba ni logs su byed par byas pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs kyis dgar ba tshig gi 'di zhes pa dmigs kyis dgar ba ni logs su byed par byas pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúspecifically‚Äù means ‚Äúdistinctively.‚Äù

original: slar yang ngag las dmigs kyis bkar ba pa ni 'di zhes pa gzhan sel ba'o //
analyzed: slar yang ngag las dmigs kyis bkar ba pa ni 'di zhes pa gzhan sel ba'o //
translated: Again, the specification of the word is by way of the exclusion of other.

original: yang ci ltar na yan lag rnam par phye ba med pa'i ngag gcig las tshig dmigs kyis bkar bar nus she na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na yan lag rnam par phye ba med pa'i ngag gcig las tshig dmigs kyis bkar bar nus she na /
translated: How is it that one can specify a word from a single sentence without dividing the parts?

original: yan lag rab tu brtags pa dang tshul gsum pa'i blos rnam par dbye bar byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yan lag rab tu brtags pa dang tshul gsum pa'i blos rnam par dbye bar byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because one divides by means of the mind which has the three modes of the examination of the parts.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa rnam ba rtags la'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa rnam ba rtags la'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore it is said, ‚Äúin the examination.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir rnam par dbye ba la yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par dbye ba la yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it in the division?

original: ngag gi don zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi don zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is because of the meaning of the sentence, etc.

original: gang gi phyir ngag don so sor spobs pa'i ming can ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ngag don so sor spobs pa'i ming can ni /
translated: Because the meaning of the sentence is the name of the confidence in the individual meanings.

original: de yis te tshig gi don gyis thog mar ma byang ba rnams la skyed do //
analyzed: de yis te tshig gi don gyis thog mar ma byang ba rnams la skyed do //
translated: That is, the meaning of the word generates in those who have not previously learned it.

original: tshig gi don mi shes pa ni sngar blos ngag gi don rtogs par bzod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig gi don mi shes pa ni sngar blos ngag gi don rtogs par bzod pa ma yin te /
translated: One who does not know the meaning of the word is not able to understand the meaning of the sentence by the mind at first.

original: de'i phyir cha shas med pa'i ngag gi don rtogs pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir na /
analyzed: de'i phyir cha shas med pa'i ngag gi don rtogs pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir na /
translated: Therefore, because it is the very means of understanding the meaning of the partless sentence,

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin du rjod par byed pa nyid du /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin du rjod par byed pa nyid du /
translated: It is like the example of nature and conditions.üîΩ

original: med kyang tshig gi don brtags so //
analyzed: med kyang tshig gi don brtags so //
translated: Although it does not exist as the nature or the condition, the meaning of the words is imagined.

original: ngag gi don du snang ba de ni nyan pa po'i rgyud la 'byung ba gang yin pa yang ngag las nyan pa po la nye bar skye zhing /
analyzed: ngag gi don du snang ba de ni nyan pa po'i rgyud la 'byung ba gang yin pa yang ngag las nyan pa po la nye bar skye zhing /
translated: That which appears as the meaning of the words arises in the continuum of the listener, and it arises in the listener from the words.

original: smra ba po'i rgyud la 'byung ba gang yin pa yang ngag kun nas slong ba po'o //
analyzed: smra ba po'i rgyud la 'byung ba gang yin pa yang ngag kun nas slong ba po'o //
translated: And that which arises in the continuum of the speaker is the motivator of the words.

original: de la snga ma'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: de la snga ma'i dbang du byas te /
translated: With regard to that, the first is stated:

original: ngag don spobs pa zhes bya gang //
analyzed: ngag don spobs pa zhes bya gang //
translated: What is called the meaning of the words, confidence,

original: de yis dang por nye bar bskyed //
analyzed: de yis dang por nye bar bskyed //
translated: is first generated by that.

original: ces so // 'di skad brjod de /
analyzed: ces so // 'di skad brjod de /
translated: This is what is said:

original: ngag gi don nyid ni de'i @287b rab tu sbyor ba po nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: ngag gi don nyid ni de'i @287b rab tu sbyor ba po nyid kyi phyir /
translated: The meaning of the words is the object of the one who applies it.

original: de'i don du smra ba pos ngag sbyar mod kyi /
analyzed: de'i don du smra ba pos ngag sbyar mod kyi /
translated: Although the speaker applies the words for that purpose,

original: ngag gi sgron ma las pha rol po'i ngag gi don gyi yul can gyi spobs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi sgron ma las pha rol po'i ngag gi don gyi yul can gyi spobs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: the object of the words is the confidence of the listener.

original: gang yang ngag kun nas slong pa po ngag de nyid dang de'i don ni sgra'i don dngos dag go zhes 'dir 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang yang ngag kun nas slong pa po ngag de nyid dang de'i don ni sgra'i don dngos dag go zhes 'dir 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The one who is the instigator of speech is speech itself, and its object is the actual object of the sound.

original: ngag gi don nyid ni des gzhal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir de ni 'bras bu'i rtags ngag gis rjes su dpag par bya ba ste /
analyzed: ngag gi don nyid ni des gzhal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir de ni 'bras bu'i rtags ngag gis rjes su dpag par bya ba ste /
translated: The object of speech is to be inferred from speech, which is a logical mark of effect, because it is what is to be evaluated by that.

original: du bas me bzhin no //
analyzed: du bas me bzhin no //
translated: It is like inferring fire from smoke.

original: tshig gi med kyang zhes pa brjod par bya ba nyid du med pa'o //
analyzed: tshig gi med kyang zhes pa brjod par bya ba nyid du med pa'o //
translated: Although the words do not exist, the object does exist.

original: gang gi phyir ngag kho na sgra dngos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ngag kho na sgra dngos te /
translated: Because speech itself is the actual sound,

original: de kho na don dang 'brel pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: de kho na don dang 'brel pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa nyid do //
translated: it is the expresser because it is connected to the object.

original: tshig rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: The words are not,

original: yi ge bzhin du tha snyad kyi yan lag ngag gi don gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge bzhin du tha snyad kyi yan lag ngag gi don gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because like the letters, they are empty of the object of speech, which is a part of the convention.

original: gang smras pa /
analyzed: gang smras pa /
translated: Someone might say,

original: med kyang nang gi ba yi ni //
analyzed: med kyang nang gi ba yi ni //
translated: ‚ÄúAlthough the internal vƒÅyu does not exist,

original: sgra rnams yod do zhes sems te //
analyzed: sgra rnams yod do zhes sems te //
translated: the sound exists.‚Äù

original: rtogs pa po yi nus med de //
analyzed: rtogs pa po yi nus med de //
translated: The one who understands is powerless;

original: 'dzin pa'i thabs kho na de'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i thabs kho na de'o //
translated: that is the method of apprehending.

original: zhes so// tshig de ngag las 'bras bu'i don du bkar ba ni lung ji lta bar rab tu brtags pas don rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so// tshig de ngag las 'bras bu'i don du bkar ba ni lung ji lta bar rab tu brtags pas don rnam par gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe word is to be taken as the meaning of the result of speech‚Äù is to be determined as the meaning of the scripture just as it is.

original: gang gi lung gang yin pa 'ga' zhig rnams kyis brjod par bya ba tha dad pa'i tshig gi don can no zhes pa lung ste /
analyzed: gang gi lung gang yin pa 'ga' zhig rnams kyis brjod par bya ba tha dad pa'i tshig gi don can no zhes pa lung ste /
translated: The scripture is that which is to be stated by some people who have different words and meanings.

original: pha rol po rnams kyi rigs dang / gzhan rnams kyi 'brel ba dang 'ga' zhig rnams kyi de dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol po rnams kyi rigs dang / gzhan rnams kyi 'brel ba dang 'ga' zhig rnams kyi de dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: It is the lineage of others, the connection of others, and the possession of some.

original: ci'i phyir dgar ba ni zhes brjod par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir dgar ba ni zhes brjod par bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it said to be a disjunction?

original: 'ba' zhig ni mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: It is said: ‚Äúbecause it is not joined to anything else.‚Äù

original: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba las sgra rnams kyi don nges par gzung bar bya zhing 'jig rten na yang tshig 'ba' zhig pa'i spyor ba med de /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba las sgra rnams kyi don nges par gzung bar bya zhing 'jig rten na yang tshig 'ba' zhig pa'i spyor ba med de /
translated: The meaning of words is to be ascertained from worldly usage, and in the world there is no usage of a word by itself.

original: gang du yang bya ba'i tshig gzhan ma thos pa shing bla ksha'o zhes pa der yang yod do //
analyzed: gang du yang bya ba'i tshig gzhan ma thos pa shing bla ksha'o zhes pa der yang yod do //
translated: Even where the word ‚Äútree‚Äù is heard without any other verbal action, there is still a connection with the meaning of the word.

original: 'gyur ro dag lhur byed pa /
analyzed: 'gyur ro dag lhur byed pa /
translated: The first person is used when the agent is not prominent.

original: skyes bu dang po rab tu ma sbyar bzhin pa yod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: skyes bu dang po rab tu ma sbyar bzhin pa yod do zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the first person is used when the agent is not prominent.

original: de skad du yang bshad pa /
analyzed: de skad du yang bshad pa /
translated: It is said:

original: gang yang 'di ci zhes dris shig / yod pa ba lang rta zhes kyang brjod pa'i dri ba kho na bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang yang 'di ci zhes dris shig / yod pa ba lang rta zhes kyang brjod pa'i dri ba kho na bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is this?‚Äù is a question that is the same as asking ‚ÄúIs there a cow or a horse?‚Äù

original: de la rab zhugs mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de la rab zhugs mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because one sees that the first person is used in that case.

original: zhes so // ji lta bur med pa la rab tu brtags pas don brjod par bya /
analyzed: zhes so // ji lta bur med pa la rab tu brtags pas don brjod par bya /
translated: How can one express the meaning by investigating what does not exist?

original: ci zhig yin zhen gsungs pa rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin du zhes pa /üîΩtshig smra ba pos ni rang bzhin la sogs pa'i @288a * //
analyzed: ci zhig yin zhen gsungs pa rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin du zhes pa / tshig smra ba pos ni rang bzhin la sogs pa'i @288a * //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúLike the nature and conditions.‚ÄùüîΩThe speaker applies the word to the meaning without distinguishing the nature, etc.

original: dbye ba med pa'i tshig don la rab tu sbyor zhing rang bzhin dang rkyen dag ni 'ba' zhig pa'i tshig gi don la rten bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: dbye ba med pa'i tshig don la rab tu sbyor zhing rang bzhin dang rkyen dag ni 'ba' zhig pa'i tshig gi don la rten bar byed pa ste /
translated: The nature and conditions are the basis for the word meaning alone.

original: 'ba' zhig pa dag sbyor ba ni med do //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pa dag sbyor ba ni med do //
translated: The application of the word to the mere thing is not made.

original: ma sbyar bdag ni yod pa nyid du nges par gzung par nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma sbyar bdag ni yod pa nyid du nges par gzung par nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The unapplied is not able to be ascertained as existent.

original: des na de dag med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na de dag med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, they do not exist at all.

original: de lta yang ji ltar de dag gi don rab tu brtags pas brjod par bya ba de ltar tshig gi'o //üîΩ'o na gzhan gyis rab tu brtags ba de kho na tshig gi don du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de lta yang ji ltar de dag gi don rab tu brtags pas brjod par bya ba de ltar tshig gi'o // 'o na gzhan gyis rab tu brtags ba de kho na tshig gi don du 'gyur mod /
translated: But just as their meaning is thoroughly investigated, so is their verbal expression.

original: med pa'i don la 'bad pa 'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: med pa'i don la 'bad pa 'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: But if the meaning of the word is the exclusion of other, why is it necessary to investigate the meaning of the word?üîΩHe says:

original: de yang rab tu brtags pa zhes pa la sogs pa /üîΩlung 'di las gzhan pa'i lung rnams la mi rigs pa'i don 'dzin pa ji lta ba de ltar /
analyzed: de yang rab tu brtags pa zhes pa la sogs pa / lung 'di las gzhan pa'i lung rnams la mi rigs pa'i don 'dzin pa ji lta ba de ltar /
translated: And that is thoroughly investigated, etc.üîΩJust as the meaning of the word is the exclusion of other, so the meaning of the scriptures is the exclusion of other.

original: khyad par rnams la rigs sgra min //
analyzed: khyad par rnams la rigs sgra min //
translated: The meaning of the scriptures is not to be grasped as something irrational, as in other scriptures.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained by the verse:üîΩParticulars are not the meaning of words, etc.

original: de'i phyir don gzhan rigs pa dang ldan pa gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba 'di nye bar 'phangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gzhan rigs pa dang ldan pa gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba 'di nye bar 'phangs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the word is the exclusion of other, which is rational.

original: 'di rigs pa dang ldan pa nyid du yang bsgrubs zin te /üîΩsgra don gzhan ni ma mthong phyir //
analyzed: 'di rigs pa dang ldan pa nyid du yang bsgrubs zin te / sgra don gzhan ni ma mthong phyir //
translated: This is also established as rational.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Because the meaning of the word is not seen to be other, etc.

original: gang gi phyir tshig gi don 'dzin pa'i thabs can zhes pa tshig gi don brtags pa'i dgos ba ston to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshig gi don 'dzin pa'i thabs can zhes pa tshig gi don brtags pa'i dgos ba ston to //
translated: The phrase the means of apprehending the meaning of the words shows the purpose of the examination of the meaning of the words.

original: tshig gi don 'dzin pa gang gis thabs yin pa de de gad brjod do //
analyzed: tshig gi don 'dzin pa gang gis thabs yin pa de de gad brjod do //
translated: The means by which one apprehends the meaning of the words is called the means of expression.

original: rang nyid kho nas tshig gi don rnams rjes su 'dzin pa las sems kyis rnam bar gnas pa'i khyad par gyi ngo bo can dbye ba med pa'i ngag gi don snang ba skye zhes bya bar 'os pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang nyid kho nas tshig gi don rnams rjes su 'dzin pa las sems kyis rnam bar gnas pa'i khyad par gyi ngo bo can dbye ba med pa'i ngag gi don snang ba skye zhes bya bar 'os pa nyid do //
translated: It is appropriate to say that the appearance of the meaning of the words arises from the special state of the mind that apprehends the meanings of the words by itself alone, having an essential nature that is not differentiated.

original: shes rab bzang po'i spobs pa can so sor nges pa'i dbye ba yongs su gcod pa'i bya ba'o zhes bya bar 'os pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab bzang po'i spobs pa can so sor nges pa'i dbye ba yongs su gcod pa'i bya ba'o zhes bya bar 'os pa nyid do //
translated: It is appropriate to say that the activity of ascertaining the specific divisions is the activity of one who has good wisdom and eloquence.

original: de ltar ni 'dis 'di ltar dang 'di ltar bya bar 'os so zhes pa bya bar 'os pa'i gzhi ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dis 'di ltar dang 'di ltar bya bar 'os so zhes pa bya bar 'os pa'i gzhi ste /
translated: In this way, it is the basis of what is to be done, saying By this, one should do it in this way and in this way.

original: de'i dngos po ni de skad gyur pa'i bya ba de'i yul can no //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de skad gyur pa'i bya ba de'i yul can no //
translated: The state of that is the object of that activity which has become like that.

original: ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i bya ba'i bar ma chad par shes rab dang spobs pa gang la nye bar skyes pa na rab tu 'jug pa'am btang snyoms su byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i bya ba'i bar ma chad par shes rab dang spobs pa gang la nye bar skyes pa na rab tu 'jug pa'am btang snyoms su byed do //
translated: When the wisdom and eloquence that have been produced by uninterrupted practice of the activity of how to accomplish it are engaged or made indifferent,

original: dang por zhes pa gang rnams sgra don gyi 'brel ba ma goms ba de rnams ni /
analyzed: dang por zhes pa gang rnams sgra don gyi 'brel ba ma goms ba de rnams ni /
translated: at first those who are not accustomed to the connection between word and meaning

original: tshig gi don 'dzin pa'i thabs can ngag gi don rtogs bar byed do //
analyzed: tshig gi don 'dzin pa'i thabs can ngag gi don rtogs bar byed do //
translated: have a method of grasping the meaning of the words and understand the meaning of the speech.

original: gang rnams sgra dang don gyi 'brel ba goms pa las ngag @288b gi don la mkhas pa nye bar skyes pa de rnams kyi yan lag med pa'i ngag kho na las cha shas med pa'i ngag gi don gyi yul can gyi spobs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang rnams sgra dang don gyi 'brel ba goms pa las ngag @288b gi don la mkhas pa nye bar skyes pa de rnams kyi yan lag med pa'i ngag kho na las cha shas med pa'i ngag gi don gyi yul can gyi spobs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who are skilled in the meaning of speech through being accustomed to the connection between word and meaning have eloquence whose object is the meaning of speech that is without parts, only from speech that is without parts.

original: gal te tshig dang de'i don te /
analyzed: gal te tshig dang de'i don te /
translated: If both the word and its meaning

original: 'di gnyis ka brda las byung ba yin na /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka brda las byung ba yin na /
translated: arise from convention,

original: 'o na sgra dang don dngos dag ci zhig yin zhe na gsungs pa ;
analyzed: 'o na sgra dang don dngos dag ci zhig yin zhe na gsungs pa ;
translated: then what are the actual sound and meaning? It is said:

original: ngag nyid kho na dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngag nyid kho na dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Only speech and so on.

original: ci'i phyir 'di yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is this? It is said:

original: de dag tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /üîΩngag la tshig la sogs pa cha shas su gyur pa rnams ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de dag tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa / ngag la tshig la sogs pa cha shas su gyur pa rnams ma yin zhing /
translated: Because they are not different.üîΩSpeech is not the parts such as words,

original: ngag gi don la tshig gi don rnams kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag gi don la tshig gi don rnams kyang ma yin te /
translated: and the meaning of speech is not the meanings of the words,

original: de rnams rab tu brtags pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de rnams rab tu brtags pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because they are thoroughly imagined.

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin dang / de dag gi don bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin dang / de dag gi don bzhin no //
translated: Like nature and conditions, and like their meanings.

original: gang gzhan tshig la sgra 'dzin par mngon bar rlom zhing tshig gi don la yang sgra'i don 'dzin par mngon par rlom pa phyin ci log pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzhan tshig la sgra 'dzin par mngon bar rlom zhing tshig gi don la yang sgra'i don 'dzin par mngon par rlom pa phyin ci log pa'o //
translated: Those who imagine that the word is apprehended by sound and that the meaning of the word is apprehended by the meaning of sound are mistaken.

original: de ni rab tu brtags pa las te lcags kyu med pa nyid kyi phyir te ;
analyzed: de ni rab tu brtags pa las te lcags kyu med pa nyid kyi phyir te ;
translated: That is because of thorough examination, because there is no hook.

original: rang dbang nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang dbang nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is because of independence.

original: rang dbang nyid kyang don la mi ltos pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: rang dbang nyid kyang don la mi ltos pa nyid kyis te /
translated: Independence is because of not depending on an object.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yang 'di ni dngos po las 'das nas 'jug bzhin pa ni rnam par gcad par mi nus so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yang 'di ni dngos po las 'das nas 'jug bzhin pa ni rnam par gcad par mi nus so //
translated: Therefore, this is engaged in having transcended entities, and it is not possible to eliminate it.

original: yang gang rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste spobs pa smos pa ni ngag kun nas slong bar byed pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: yang gang rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste spobs pa smos pa ni ngag kun nas slong bar byed pa nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: Again, ‚Äúthose‚Äù and so forth. Eloquence is mentioned to illustrate the motivation of speech.

original: de'i phyir des brjod 'dod kyang 'phen te /
analyzed: de'i phyir des brjod 'dod kyang 'phen te /
translated: Therefore, it is also projected by the desire to express it.

original: spobs ba dang brjod 'dod spangs nas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: spobs ba dang brjod 'dod spangs nas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that eloquence and the desire to express are abandoned.

original: de las gzhan phyi rol gyi don ba lang la sogs pa'am /
analyzed: de las gzhan phyi rol gyi don ba lang la sogs pa'am /
translated: Other than that, external objects such as cows and so forth,

original: ngag phyi rol gyi don rnams kyi 'brel pa phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid can sgra don du rtogs par byed pa de rnams kyi yang de rtogs pa tsam ste /
analyzed: ngag phyi rol gyi don rnams kyi 'brel pa phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid can sgra don du rtogs par byed pa de rnams kyi yang de rtogs pa tsam ste /
translated: or the connection of external objects with speech, which is characterized by mutual benefit, is understood as the meaning of the word. Those are also merely understood.

original: rigs pa med pa don gyis stong ba zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rigs pa med pa don gyis stong ba zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that without reason, it is empty of meaning.

original: 'dis ni spobs ba dang brjod 'dod ni ngag gi don to zhes rang gi lugs gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis ni spobs ba dang brjod 'dod ni ngag gi don to zhes rang gi lugs gsal bar byed do //
translated: This clarifies our own system, which states that eloquence and the desire to express are the meaning of speech.

original: ci'i rgyus rnam par rtog pa tsam yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i rgyus rnam par rtog pa tsam yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: ji ltar goms bzhin zhes ba la sogs ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar goms bzhin zhes ba la sogs ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn accordance with the habit-energy‚Äù and so on.

original: gang dang gang goms pa ni ji lta bar goms pa'o //
analyzed: gang dang gang goms pa ni ji lta bar goms pa'o //
translated: Whatever is habituated is as it is habituated.

original: rang gi rkyen gyi rjes byed pas //
analyzed: rang gi rkyen gyi rjes byed pas //
translated: ‚ÄúFollowing its own conditions‚Äù

original: zhes pa / rang gi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa'i rten bag chags te de dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes pa / rang gi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa'i rten bag chags te de dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyis so //
translated: means that its own conditions are the habitual propensities of consciousness, and it is in accordance with them.

original: phyi rol gyi don med kyang gang @289a * //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don med kyang gang @289a * //
translated: Even though there are no external objects,

original: las goms pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnam pa dum can skye ste /
analyzed: las goms pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa rnam pa dum can skye ste /
translated: from whatever is habituated, a cognition with various aspects is born.

original: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi don nam de'i 'brel pa ni ngag gi don du 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi don nam de'i 'brel pa ni ngag gi don du 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that external objects or their connection is the referent of words.

original: yang yang du don goms pa sgra'i don 'dzin pa ste /üîΩdes byas pa rnam par shes pa la nus pa'i khyad par ni don goms pa'i bag chags te de la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang yang du don goms pa sgra'i don 'dzin pa ste / des byas pa rnam par shes pa la nus pa'i khyad par ni don goms pa'i bag chags te de la ltos pa'o //
translated: Habituation to an object again and again is the apprehension of the referent of a word.üîΩThe special potency produced by that in consciousness is the habitual propensity of the habituation to an object, and it depends on that.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan can don bya ba rtogs pa ngo bo sna tshogs pa skye'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan can don bya ba rtogs pa ngo bo sna tshogs pa skye'o //
translated: The cognition of the function of the object, which has that as its causal basis, is born with a manifold nature.

original: rtogs pa pos don bya ba spobs pa gang zhig skyes pas rtogs pa de ni don bya ba rtogs pa ngo bo sna tshogs skye ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa pos don bya ba spobs pa gang zhig skyes pas rtogs pa de ni don bya ba rtogs pa ngo bo sna tshogs skye ba'o //
translated: The realization of the speaker is the realization of the object, which is the arising of the various natures.

original: ngag gi bag chags rab tu sad pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du bstan pa'i ched du ngag las zhes bshad do //
analyzed: ngag gi bag chags rab tu sad pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du bstan pa'i ched du ngag las zhes bshad do //
translated: In order to teach the reason for the arousal of the latent impressions of speech, he says ‚Äúfrom speech.‚Äù

original: rang gi rkyen dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du zhes pa /
analyzed: rang gi rkyen dang rjes su mthun pa nyid du zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúIn accordance with their own conditions‚Äù means

original: gang zhig gi bag chags gang 'dra ba de'i de dang rjes su mthun pa kho na'i spobs pa nye bar skye'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig gi bag chags gang 'dra ba de'i de dang rjes su mthun pa kho na'i spobs pa nye bar skye'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: that the speaker‚Äôs eloquence arises only in accordance with the latent impressions of the listener.

original: stag la sogs pa thos pa bzhin du zhes pa /
analyzed: stag la sogs pa thos pa bzhin du zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúLike the apprehension of a tiger, etc.‚Äù

original: stag med kyang stag gnas so zhes brjod pa na stag gis sgrub par byed pa gnas pa'i bya bar snang ba'i rtogs pa nye bar skye ste /
analyzed: stag med kyang stag gnas so zhes brjod pa na stag gis sgrub par byed pa gnas pa'i bya bar snang ba'i rtogs pa nye bar skye ste /
translated: means that even when there is no tiger, when one says ‚Äúthe tiger is here,‚Äù the listener has the apprehension that the tiger is the subject of the action of being here.

original: sogs pa'i sgras chu klung gi 'gram na bu ram gyi shing rta yod ces pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras chu klung gi 'gram na bu ram gyi shing rta yod ces pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes such expressions as ‚Äúthere is a sugar cane plant on the bank of the river.‚Äù

original: de khyad par med na yang ste ngag gi don khyad par med pa la /
analyzed: de khyad par med na yang ste ngag gi don khyad par med pa la /
translated: If there is no difference in the meaning of the words,

original: don bya ba rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye'o zhes dkyus ma dang sbrel lo //
analyzed: don bya ba rtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa skye'o zhes dkyus ma dang sbrel lo //
translated: then the conceptual thought that understands the object arises.

original: sgeg pa'i snyan dang gas thos pa las //
analyzed: sgeg pa'i snyan dang gas thos pa las //
translated: From hearing the sweet sounds of a flirtatious woman,

original: zhes ba / mchu dang 'o ma 'dzin pa la sogs pa bsngags pa'i ngag thos pa las /
analyzed: zhes ba / mchu dang 'o ma 'dzin pa la sogs pa bsngags pa'i ngag thos pa las /
translated: from hearing the words of praise such as ‚Äúher lips are like a fruit, her breasts are like a pot,‚Äù

original: dngos po tha mi dad na yang chags pa can rnams la 'dod chags dang rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po tha mi dad na yang chags pa can rnams la 'dod chags dang rjes su mthun pa'i rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: even though the thing is not different, for those who are attached, a conceptual thought that is compatible with attachment arises.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the aspect of being attractive.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la ni yid 'byung ba dang rdzas su mthun pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams la ni yid 'byung ba dang rdzas su mthun pa ste /
translated: For those who are free from attachment, a conceptual thought that is compatible with aversion arises.

original: yid du mi 'ong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yid du mi 'ong ba'i rnam pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because of the aspect of being unattractive.

original: 'di dag la ngag gi yul nyid la srid pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di dag la ngag gi yul nyid la srid pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible for these to be the objects of speech,

original: yul ni gcig gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul ni gcig gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the object has the nature of being one.

original: 'dis ni ngag ni ngag don gyi rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul par ston cing /
analyzed: 'dis ni ngag ni ngag don gyi rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul par ston cing /
translated: This shows that speech is mistaken with regard to the nature of the meaning of speech.

original: gang zhig gang las 'khrul pa de ni de rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las 'khrul pa de ni de rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is mistaken about something does not understand that thing,

original: mi rtag pa nyid la lus can ma yin pa nyid bzhin /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la lus can ma yin pa nyid bzhin /
translated: like impermanence is mistaken about what has the nature of being impermanent.

original: ngag kyang ngag don gyi rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul pa'o zhes pa khyab byed @289b dang 'ga' ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ngag kyang ngag don gyi rang gi ngo bo la 'khrul pa'o zhes pa khyab byed @289b dang 'ga' ba gsungs so //
translated: Speech is mistaken about the meaning of speech.

original: 'o na gang gi yang spobs pa ni ngag gi don zhes 'dod ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na gang gi yang spobs pa ni ngag gi don zhes 'dod ba ma yin nam /
translated: Well, isn't the meaning of speech the object of the confidence of all?

original: de'i yang de ni rnam par rtog pa tsam ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i yang de ni rnam par rtog pa tsam ma yin zhing /
translated: The meaning of speech is not merely a conceptual image.

original: spobs pa tha mi dad na yang sgeg pa'i snyan dang gas thos pa las ji skad bshad pa'i rtogs pa tha dad pa mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spobs pa tha mi dad na yang sgeg pa'i snyan dang gas thos pa las ji skad bshad pa'i rtogs pa tha dad pa mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Even though confidence is not different, one sees different realizations, such as the realization of the meaning of speech, from hearing the speech of others.

original: gang ngag gis kun nas bskyed pa'i rtogs pa ngag don gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'dod pa'i pha rol bo kho na la skyon 'di ston gyi /
analyzed: gang ngag gis kun nas bskyed pa'i rtogs pa ngag don gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can du 'dod pa'i pha rol bo kho na la skyon 'di ston gyi /
translated: This is not so, because this fault is only shown to the opponent who asserts that the realization generated by speech has the meaning of speech as its object.

original: kho bo cag la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag la ni ma yin te /
translated: This fault is not shown to us.

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ma yin pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you accept that conceptual consciousnesses are not directed at objects that are specifically characterized.

original: da ni spobs pa mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi nang du 'dus par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni spobs pa mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gi nang du 'dus par bstan pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to teach that eloquence is included among direct perception and inference, he says:üîΩThat which is eloquence is also a conceptual consciousness.

original: de yang zhes ba la sogs pa lhas byin pa dkar mo mngon du ded cig ces pa la sogs pa'i ngag las gang nyan ba po la spobs pa skye ba de ni mchod sbyin grong khyer skya snar gyi bur song cig ces pa la sogs pa dag gzhan
analyzed: de yang zhes ba la sogs pa lhas byin pa dkar mo mngon du ded cig ces pa la sogs pa'i ngag las gang nyan ba po la spobs pa skye ba de ni mchod sbyin grong khyer skya snar gyi bur song cig ces pa la sogs pa dag gzhan
translated: The meaning of the words ‚ÄúDevadatta, bring the white cow‚Äù and so on that gives rise to eloquence in the listener is the opposite of the meaning of the words ‚ÄúGo to the city of ≈örƒÅvastƒ´ and kill the son of a brahmin‚Äù and so on.

original: rnams kyi don gang yin pa de rnams las log pa'i don la spobs pa spyi dang khyad par la 'dod do //
analyzed: rnams kyi don gang yin pa de rnams las log pa'i don la spobs pa spyi dang khyad par la 'dod do //
translated: The meaning of those is the general and specific objects of eloquence.

original: de ltar na ngag rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kho na'i spobs ba rnams de'i don gyi yul can no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na ngag rnams ji snyed pa de snyed kho na'i spobs ba rnams de'i don gyi yul can no zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus it is said that there are as many types of eloquence as there are types of speech, and they are directed at their objects.

original: 'dis ni spobs pa du ma nyid du ston cing /
analyzed: 'dis ni spobs pa du ma nyid du ston cing /
translated: This teaches that there are many types of eloquence.

original: spobs pa'i spyi ngag kun nas slong bar rtogs pa'i yul yod do zhes gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: spobs pa'i spyi ngag kun nas slong bar rtogs pa'i yul yod do zhes gsal bar byed do //
translated: The existence of the object of the understanding that is the universal of speech is made clear.

original: yul du ma'i gzhi can ni rtogs pa'i spyi'o //
analyzed: yul du ma'i gzhi can ni rtogs pa'i spyi'o //
translated: The universal of the understanding is the basis of many objects.

original: 'brel pa shes pa'i zhes pa /
analyzed: 'brel pa shes pa'i zhes pa /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe knowledge of the relation‚Äù

original: gang sgra dang don dag gis 'brel pa shes pa'o//
analyzed: gang sgra dang don dag gis 'brel pa shes pa'o//
translated: means the knowledge of the relation between the word and the object.

original: 'dis ni ngag rtogs so zhes dgongs pas /
analyzed: 'dis ni ngag rtogs so zhes dgongs pas /
translated: The idea is that this is the understanding of speech.

original: gang zhig spyi'i ngo bo ni don la 'brel pa shes pa'i rtags las rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig spyi'i ngo bo ni don la 'brel pa shes pa'i rtags las rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: That which is understood from the sign of the knowledge of the relation of the universal to the object is inference.

original: du ba las me rtogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: du ba las me rtogs pa bzhin /
translated: It is like the understanding of fire from smoke.

original: smra ba po'i spobs pa las nyan pa po'i spobs pa yang de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin gsungs so //
analyzed: smra ba po'i spobs pa las nyan pa po'i spobs pa yang de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin gsungs so //
translated: The speaker‚Äôs confidence is like the listener‚Äôs confidence. This is the nature of the argument.

original: gang zhig ngag las rtogs pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: gang zhig ngag las rtogs pa ni zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is understood from speech‚Äù and so on

original: gang rang rig par bya ba de ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi nang du 'du ste /
analyzed: gang rang rig par bya ba de ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi nang du 'du ste /
translated: means that that which is to be known by oneself is included in the direct perception of self-awareness.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa bzhin spobs pa yang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa bzhin spobs pa yang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin kho na'o //
translated: Like desire and so on, confidence is like that. This is the nature of the argument.

original: re zhig rigs na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: re zhig rigs na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The word sometimes and so on.

original: rgyu mtshan @290a * //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan @290a * //
translated: The reasons

original: can rnams ni rigs dang yon tan dang bya ba dang rdzas kyi sgra rnams so //
analyzed: can rnams ni rigs dang yon tan dang bya ba dang rdzas kyi sgra rnams so //
translated: are the words for type, quality, action, and substance.

original: de rnams la rang nyid ji lta ba'i rgyu mtshan dang ldan ba'i don du ma gzhan so sor spyi'i ngo bos mngon par brjod pa srid do //
analyzed: de rnams la rang nyid ji lta ba'i rgyu mtshan dang ldan ba'i don du ma gzhan so sor spyi'i ngo bos mngon par brjod pa srid do //
translated: It is possible that they are expressed by the general nature of other individual meanings that have the reasons just as they are.

original: 'dod rgyal ba dngos po gcig la nya bar lhung ba rnams la ni ce ltar yin /
analyzed: 'dod rgyal ba dngos po gcig la nya bar lhung ba rnams la ni ce ltar yin /
translated: What about the accidental ones that are applied to one thing?

original: de rnams la brjod par bya ba spyi yod ba ma yin pas te /
analyzed: de rnams la brjod par bya ba spyi yod ba ma yin pas te /
translated: They do not have a general meaning to be expressed because

original: spyi ni du ma la brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni du ma la brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: a generality is based on many things.

original: 'dis ni 'dod rgyal ba rnams spyi'i don mi brjod pa'i phyir khas blangs ba nyams pa smras so //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dod rgyal ba rnams spyi'i don mi brjod pa'i phyir khas blangs ba nyams pa smras so //
translated: This shows that the assertion that accidental words do not express a general meaning is undermined.

original: 'dod rgyal ba la'ang zhes ba la sogs pas di ta tha la sogs pa rnams du ba nyid du ston cing /
analyzed: 'dod rgyal ba la'ang zhes ba la sogs pas di ta tha la sogs pa rnams du ba nyid du ston cing /
translated: He shows that the words dita and so on are smoke by saying even in the accidental ones and so on.

original: de la yang spyi yod do zhes sgrub par byed do //

analyzed: de'i phyir khas blangs pa nyams pa ma yin no ; /'o na ci zhes pa la sogs pa rnams te /

analyzed: gal te gnyis ka yang spyi rjod par byed pa dag yin na rigs dang tshogs pa'i sgra dag la khyad par ci zhig yod de /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du med pa ma yin ba kho na'o zhes pa ste / gzhan du na 'di ni rigs kyi sgra'o //

analyzed: 'di ni tshogs pa'i sgra'o zhes pa tha dad du mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni so sor yan lag rnams la dngos su 'jug cing /

analyzed: 'di ni rigs dang tshogs pa'i sgra dag gi khyad par te /

translated: The word ‚Äúspecial‚Äù in the phrase ‚Äúspecial part‚Äù refers to the fact that the words ‚Äúhundred‚Äù and so on, which express the collection of the parts of a definite number, are not applied to the parts themselves.

analyzed: dmar po khra bo'i yan lag la 'jug ba ma yin no //

analyzed: re re la yongs su rdzogs pa ste zhes pa dang / cha shas re re la gtso bor rab tu sbyar ro zhes pa'i don to //

analyzed: gtso bo zhes pa 'di ci las she na / phyi ma la nye bar btags pa zhes @291a * //

analyzed: de phyogs gcig skyes bu la 'jug pa'o //

analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ni de'i rigs mthun pa kho na'i tshogs pa dang tshogs pa ma yin pa yang ngo zhes pa'o //

original: 'o na gang 'di nyid nyi ma la sogs pa'i sgra gsal ba gcig la nye bar ltung ba de rnams ci ltar spyi brjod pa yin zhe na /

analyzed: de la yang nyi ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gnas skabs tha dad pas tha dad pa'i phyir du ma nyid yod do zhes pas mi skyon no //

original: 'brel pa ma byas pa zhes pa /
analyzed: 'brel pa ma byas pa zhes pa /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúwithout a connection being made‚Äù means

analyzed: 'brel pa mi shes pa'i rtogs pa po'o //

analyzed: 'brel pa zhes ma byas pa'i sgra las skyes pa'i rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /

original: de la ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas ni ma grub pa nyid du gsungs so//üîΩrtogs bas zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: de la ma yin zhes pa la sogs pas ni ma grub pa nyid du gsungs so// rtogs bas zhes pa la sogs pas ni /

original: 'di kho na la 'thad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di kho na la 'thad pa'o //

analyzed: 'o na 'di sgra yang nye ba mngon sum pa'i dngos po'i spyi rjod par byed pa ma yin nam /

original: @291b des na ci zhig las des pa na sa'i don 'grub ce na /
analyzed: @291b des na ci zhig las des pa na sa'i don 'grub ce na /
translated: Then what is the point of the word? How is the meaning of the word established?

analyzed: skyon 'di med de ji ltar 'brel ba rtogs pa'i shing gi sgra spyi rjod par byed pa yang gang gi tshe mdun na gnas pa'i ba la sha la sogs ba la shing 'di chod cig ces sbyor ba de'i tshe shing gi bye brag kho na la 'jug pa
translated: This fault does not exist. Just as the word tree, which expresses the universal by the understanding of the relation, when one says cut this tree in reference to a particular tree such as a birch tree in front, at that time it engages only in a particular tree.

original: de ltar 'di sgra yang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar 'di sgra yang ngo //

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /

analyzed: ming bye brag tu rtogs pa'o zhes pa /

analyzed: pa na sa'i sgras der ming bye brag tu rtogs pa tsam bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúvana‚Äù is merely for the purpose of understanding the particular name there.

original: 'di kho na gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di kho na gsal bar byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: He states this very thing to clarify:

original: 'brel ba rab tu bstan pa'i don ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: gang 'di'i sgra ba na sa'i don can dang pa na sa'i sgra gzhi mthun pa nyid de ni 'brel ba bstan pa'i don can no //

original: 'o na brjod par bya ba gcig la sgra dag 'jug pa ni gzhi mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'o na brjod par bya ba gcig la sgra dag 'jug pa ni gzhi mthun pa nyid do //

analyzed: de'i tshe yang 'brel pa mi shes pa nyid kyi phyir pa na sa'i sgra'i don med pa kho na ste /

original: de ci las gzhi mthun pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ci las gzhi mthun pa nyid yin zhe na /

original: brdar byed du 'jug ba pos ming nyid kyis pa na sa'i don la 'jug ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'di sgra'i don la nges par sbyar te /
analyzed: brdar byed du 'jug ba pos ming nyid kyis pa na sa'i don la 'jug ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'di sgra'i don la nges par sbyar te /
translated: Because the one who makes the convention causes the meaning of the word to be engaged by the name, at that time this is connected to the meaning of the word.

analyzed: de'i phyir de la 'jug go zhes pas mi skyon no //
translated: Therefore, it is not faulty to say, ‚ÄúIt engages that.‚Äù

original: 'dir 'di don yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'di don yin te /

analyzed: ming dang ming can gyi 'brel ba rtogs pa tsam gyi don can kho na de'i tshe ba na sa'i sgra'i yin te /
translated: The meaning of the word ‚Äúpanasa‚Äù at that time is only the mere understanding of the connection between the name and the named.

original: 'di'i sgra'i yul pa na sa la ming nyid du nges par sbyar ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i sgra'i yul pa na sa la ming nyid du nges par sbyar ba'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthis‚Äù is connected to the meaning of the word ‚Äúpanasa‚Äù as the name.

original: yang ci ltar de dang 'brel pa rab tu bstan par nus /
analyzed: yang ci ltar de dang 'brel pa rab tu bstan par nus /
translated: How can the connection with that be taught?

original: ji tsam gyis 'di de la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dngos por yod pa cung zad kyang khyed kyis 'dod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis 'di de la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan dngos por yod pa cung zad kyang khyed kyis 'dod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: To the extent that this is the reason for engaging that, you do not assert that there is any existent thing at all.

original: gnyis ka'i brjod par bya ba'o zhes byas nas so zhes pa /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i brjod par bya ba'o zhes byas nas so zhes pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of expression of both‚Äù means

original: pa na sa dang 'di'i sgra gnyis ka dag kyang rjod byed du 'os pa'am /
analyzed: pa na sa dang 'di'i sgra gnyis ka dag kyang rjod byed du 'os pa'am /
translated: both the word ‚Äúpanasa‚Äù and the word ‚Äúthis‚Äù are suitable to be the expression.

original: gnyis dag gis brjod par nus pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis dag gis brjod par nus pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is possible to express both.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: sgra rnams 'dad pa tsam gyis 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir don rnams thams cad la rung ba ste /
analyzed: sgra rnams 'dad pa tsam gyis 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir don rnams thams cad la rung ba ste /
translated: Because the engagement of words is merely by way of desire, all objects are suitable.

original: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang 'brel ba bstan bar nus so //üîΩde'i don nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ni ming gi don can pa na sa'i sgra yin no zhes pa pa na sa des don dang ldan ba @292a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan med kyang 'brel ba bstan bar nus so // de'i don nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ni ming gi don can pa na sa'i sgra yin no zhes pa pa na sa des don dang ldan ba @292a * //
translated: Therefore, even though there is no other reason for engagement, it is possible to teach the relationship.

original: ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because it is not the meaning of that, the word ‚ÄúpƒÅna‚Äù is the word for ‚Äúearth.‚Äù Because that ‚ÄúpƒÅna‚Äù does not have the meaning of ‚Äúearth,‚Äù

original: pa na sa'i sgra ni ming bye brag tu rtogs pa'i dgos pa can no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: pa na sa'i sgra ni ming bye brag tu rtogs pa'i dgos pa can no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: the word ‚ÄúpƒÅna‚Äù has the purpose of understanding the specific name.

original: 'o na de kho na zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: 'o na de kho na zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: Now, in response to that, he says ‚Äúthat itself,‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di'i sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa gang yin pa de kho na sgra'i sgrub ba'i ngo bor brjod par bya bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'di'i sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa gang yin pa de kho na sgra'i sgrub ba'i ngo bor brjod par bya bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: Whatever the relationship between the word and the meaning, that itself should be stated as the nature of the establishment of the word.

original: de las kyang khyad par 'di kho nas /
analyzed: de las kyang khyad par 'di kho nas /
translated: And from that, this is the only difference.

original: sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa las tshang ma gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes sems pa'o //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba rjes su dpag pa las tshang ma gzhan du 'gyur ro zhes sems pa'o //
translated: One thinks, The word is different from the whole.

original: tshad ma gzhan gyis nye bar dmigs nas zhes pa mngon sum la sogs pas so //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyis nye bar dmigs nas zhes pa mngon sum la sogs pas so //
translated: Having perceived by another valid cognition means by perception, etc.

original: yang ji ltar mngon sum gyis 'brel ba can dag nye bar dmigs /
analyzed: yang ji ltar mngon sum gyis 'brel ba can dag nye bar dmigs /
translated: But how can perception perceive that which is related?

original: ji tsam du sgra dang don dag ni spyi'i ngo bo dag go zhes bsgrubs zin cing /
analyzed: ji tsam du sgra dang don dag ni spyi'i ngo bo dag go zhes bsgrubs zin cing /
translated: It has been established that a word and its meaning are universals.

original: mngon sum spyi'i yul can yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon sum spyi'i yul can yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And perception does not have a universal for its object.

original: pha rol po'i 'dod pas 'di skad bshad ba'o //
analyzed: pha rol po'i 'dod pas 'di skad bshad ba'o //
translated: This is said according to the opponent's belief.

original: yang na tshad ma gzhan gyi rjes la byung ba'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: yang na tshad ma gzhan gyi rjes la byung ba'i shes pa ste /
translated: Or else, by another valid cognition means by a cognition that arises after another valid cognition.

original: 'bras bu la rgyus nye bar btags pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan gyi sgras brjod do zhes pas mi skyon no //
analyzed: 'bras bu la rgyus nye bar btags pa'i phyir tshad ma gzhan gyi sgras brjod do zhes pas mi skyon no //
translated: Since the effect is figuratively designated by the cause, there is no fault in expressing the effect by the word another valid cognition.

original: yid kyis brtags pa'o zhes pas 'brel ba ni 'brel ba can las tha dad par med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: yid kyis brtags pa'o zhes pas 'brel ba ni 'brel ba can las tha dad par med pa kho na ste /
translated: Imagined by the mind means that the relation does not exist separately from the relata.
